Conventioal Premier Banking:

ENGLISH

Eligibility: To qualify for Conventional Premier Banking, customers need to maintain minimum average balance as per the below-mentioned criteria:

Product Current Account:

Average quarterly balance of PKR 3 Million or above; or,

Product Savings Account:

Average quarterly balance of PKR 7 Million or above; or,

Product Current Account & Bancassurance:

Average quarterly balance of PKR 2 Million in Current Account & PKR 1 Million Bancassurance; or,

Product Assets Under Management (AUM)*:

PKR 10 Million including at least PKR 2 Million average quarterly balance in Current Account

*Eligible Assets Under Management - Bancassurance, Mutual Funds, Current Account, Savings Account & Term Deposits

 

Urdu

Eligibility: Conventional Premier Banking ke liye qualify karne ke liye, customers ko neeche diye gaye criteria ke mutabiq minimum average balance maintain karna hoga:

Product: Current Account Package:

PKR 3 Million ya is se ooper ki average quarterly balance; ya

Product: Savings Account Package:

PKR 7 Million ya is se ooper ki average quarterly balance; ya

Product: Current Account & Bancassurance Package:

PKR 2 Million in Current Account aur PKR 1 Million Bancassurance ki average quarterly balance; ya

Product: Assets Under Management (AUM)*:

PKR 10 Million jismein se kam se kam PKR 2 Million average quarterly balance Current Account mein ho

*Eligible Assets Under Management - Bancassurance, Mutual Funds, Current Account, Savings Account & Term Deposits

Islamic Premier Banking

English

Eligibility to qualify as an Islamic Premier customer you must maintain quarterly average balance as per the below mentioned grid:

Product CASA (Current Account/ Saving Account):

Average quarterly balance of PKR 3 Million (or Equivalent FCY)

Combination 1: Current and Saving Account (CASA) & Banca Takaful:

PKR 2 Million Current and Saving Account (CASA) & PKR 1 million Banca Takaful, or

Combination 2: Assets Under Management (AUM):

PKR 10 Million AUM* including at least PKR 2 million in Current and Saving Account (CASA)

*Eligible Assets Under Management (AUM) - Bancatakaful, Mutual Funds, Current and Savings Account & Term Deposits

 

Urdu

Premier customer banne ke liye aap ko three categories mein quarterly average balance maintain karna hoga, jaise ke nichay di gai grid mein diya gaya hai:

Product CASA (Current Account/ Saving Account):

Average quarterly balance of PKR 3 Million (or Equivalent FCY)

Combination 1: Current and Saving Account (CASA) & Banca Takaful:

PKR 2 Million Current and Saving Account (CASA) & PKR 1 million Banca Takaful, or

Combination 2: Assets Under Management (AUM):

PKR 10 Million AUM* including at least PKR 2 million in Current and Saving Account (CASA)

*Eligible Assets Under Management (AUM) - Bancatakaful, Mutual Funds, Current and Savings Account & Term Deposits

·         Accelerated Orbits: Earn higher Orbits along with enhanced product sign-up bonus. Redeem Orbits through Alfa Mall, or simply use them to pay bills through Alfa or Internet Banking.

·         Jetsetter Orbits: With Jetsetter, we make sure that every rupee you spend leads to another travel experience. When you redeem your Orbits through our call center for airline tickets, hotel bookings and class upgrades, they are Jetsetter Orbits and carry 3x value each.

·         *Moreover, 1,000+ airport lounges welcome you via LoungeKey (Premier Signature Debit Card) for a memorable experience even beyond borders.

·         That's not all; members can enjoy an array of free banking services, fee waivers, preferential pricing, priority processing, discounted mark-up, and much more.

IF customer, did not get OTAC / OTP:

English

Dear customer, you will need to activate international roaming on your SIM in order to receive calls or codes. All of our overseas customers activate international roaming to ensure that they do not face any issues with banking-related matters.

Dear customer, if you are not receiving the bank's messages (OTP / OTAC codes/ transaction alerts), please confirm whether you are currently out of the country or if you have updated your mobile network recently?

OTAC is sent on your registered mobile number & email address respectively. Further, this feature can neither be changed nor disabled.

 

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, aap ko apni sim per international roaming activate karwani hogi jabhi aap ko calls ya code receive honge. Hamare tamam overseas customers international roaming activate karwate ta k unko kisi qism ka masla pesh na aae banking kay hawale se.

Moazziz sarif, agar aap ko bank kay otp code receive nahi horahe hain toh kindly confirm kijiye kia aap iss waqt out of country hain ya phir aap ne apna mobile ka network update kia hai?

OTAC aapke registered mobile number aur email address par bheja jata hai. Is feature ko na toh badla ja sakta hai aur na hi band kiya ja sakta hai.

 

Removed orbits / Orbits Terminate / Orbits Cancel

English

Dear customer, Accumulated orbits on a credit card will be terminated once credit card cancelled.

If any of customer relationship with the bank is canalled permanently, orbits earned on those products will be removed.

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, Credit card ke total collected orbits ko credit card cancel hone par khatam kar diya jayega.

Agar kisi customer ka bank se relation permanently khatam ho jata hai, to customer kay hasil kiye gaye orbits bhi hata diye jayenge.

Credit Card Bill / late payment / Minimum Payment / Mark up:

English

Dear customer, if you pay your credit card bill on due date or before the due date, the bank will not charge you any fees. However, if you fail to pay the bill, the bank will impose a late payment fee of PKR 1,850 or 10% of minimum amount + 16 % FED, whichever is higher plus a 16% Federal Excise Duty (FED), and there will be a mark-up charge which amounts to 0.12% on each individual transaction calculated from the date of transaction. This mark-up will also be applied to the total outstanding amount. Additionally, if you only pay the minimum amount of your bill, the bank will not levy the late payment charge, but the aforementioned mark-up will still be charged as explained.

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, agar aap apne credit ka bill due date per ya usse pehle pay kardete hain toh bank aap ko koi charges nahi charged karta. Incase agar aap bill pay nahi karte hain toh bank aap ko late payment charged karega jo kay PKR 1,850 or 10% of minimum amount, whichever is higher + 16% FED aur mark-up charged karta hai jo kay aap ki tamam single transaction per 0.12 % charge hoga or transaction date se charged hoga aur yeh mark-up aap kay outstanding amountper charged hoga. Mazeed agar aap bill ka sirf minimum amount pay karenge toh bank ko late payment charge nahi karega baqi mark-up wesi charge hoga jesa kay aap ko bataya gaya hai.

If Credit Card limit is less and product price is higher

English

Dear customer, if your credit card's assigned limit is not in line with the price of the product you intend to purchase, you cannot buy that product on installment. It is necessary for your credit card limit to be equal to the product price. Additionally, you cannot add any extra amount to your assigned limit on your own. In this scenario, the card cannot be used in excess of the limit.

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, agar aap kay credit card ki assigned limit aap kay product kay price kay mutabiq nahi hai toh aap uss product ko instalment per buy nahi kar sakte hain. Lazmi hai aap kay credit card ki limit product price kay baraber ho. Mazeed aap extra amount khud se add nahi kar sakte hain apni assigned limit mein. Aur card iss screnario mein excess limit mein use nahi kia ja sakta hai.

 

If customer, made wrong payment / wrong financial transaction:

English

Dear customer, if you have accidentally topped up a wrong number or have transferred money into someone’s account by mistake, or any other financial transaction has been made in error, then no dispute can be claimed in this regard. Furthermore, you can submit a claim form at your parent branch. And if you are a credit card user, for this matter, please email us at contactus@bankalfalah.com.

We deeply apologize for any inconvenience caused to you.

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, agar aap ne galti se kisi number per top up kardia hai ya phir galti se kisi kay account mein paise transfer kardiye ya koi bhi financial transaction aap se galti se hogai hai toh iss hawale se dispute nahi hota. Mazeed aap apni parent branch jaa kar claim form submit kar sakte hain. Aur agar aap credit card user hain to iss hawale se aap email kijiye contactus@bankalfalah.com per.

Takleef kay liye buhat mazrat chahte hain aap se.

 

If customer make transaction from other bank account / Bank Alfalah account not credit:

English

Dear customer, as per the process, you lodge your claim by calling the helpline of the bank from which the money was sent. It is the sender bank that resolves your claim. You can also confirm the account status of your receiver bank by calling our helpline. The receiver bank does not have access to lodge a claim. The sender bank can indeed investigate.

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, process kay tehat jis bank se paise bheje jate hain ussi bank ki helpline per call kar kay aap apna claim lodge karwate hain. Aur sender bank hi aap kay claim ko resolve karta hai. Mazeed aap apne receiver bank ka account status zarur confirm kar sakte hain hamari helpline per call kar kay. Receiver bank kay pass access nahi hota claim lodge karne ka. Sender bank bilkul investigate kar sakta hai.

If customer want to receive huge amount in account / receiving remittances in salary account / purpose of account:

English

Dear customer, there are no restrictions on depositing money into your Bank Alfalah account. However, if the branch requires any additional documents, you'll need to provide them. It's usually best to use the account for the same purpose for which it was opened. If you're using the account for a different purpose, the bank may require documents. Alternatively, if you wish, you can open another account with the bank that suits your specific purpose.

Urdu

Mazeed behtar yahi hota hai jis purpose kay liye aap ne account open kia aap ussi purpose kay liye hi account ko use kijiye. Ya aap agar chahen toh dosra account apne purpose kay mutabiq bank mein open karwa sakte hain.

 

 

 

Giro fee / direct debit enrolled from BAF account / Credit card payment:

English

Dear customer, a Rejected Auto pay Service Fee (giro) is charged in the event that you have linked your Bank Alfalah credit card for bill payment with your Bank Alfalah account, and when the system attempts to pay your Bank Alfalah credit card bill, if there is insufficient balance in your account. In such cases, you will be charged a Rejected Auto pay Service Fee which is PKR 1,200 plus 16% FED (Federal Excise Duty). If you wish to cancel the direct debit service, please call our helpline and submit your request. Our helpline for general banking is 021-111-225-111 / 042-111-225-111.

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, Rejected Auto pay Service Fee (giro) fee charged jab hoti hai jab aap kay bank alfalah kay credit card ki bill payment aap kay bank alfalah kay account kay sath link ho aur jab system aap kay bank alfalah kay credit card kay bill ko pay kare toh aap kay account mein balance moujood na ho uss sorat mein aap ko Rejected Autopay Service Fee charged hoti hai jo kay PKR 1,200 + 16 % FED hai. Aur agar aap direct debit service ko khatam karna chahte hain toh iss hawale se aap hamari helpline per call kijiye aur apni request submit kijiye. Hamari helpline number general banking kay liye 021-111-225-111 / 042-111-225-111.

For direct debit enrolment from Bank Alfalah Account:

English:

Dear valued customer, if you have an account with Bank Alfalah, you can enroll for direct debit. With this, the bank will automatically pay the full billed amount or the minimum payment due on your credit card 48 working hours before the due date. In case your account balance is insufficient, the bank will apply charges of PKR 1,200 plus 16% Federal Excise Duty (FED) to your account.

URDU:

Moazziz sarif, agar aap ka Bank Alfalah mein account hai toh aap direct debit enrol karwa sakte hain jis per Bank aap kay credit card kay billed amount ki full payment / minimum pay due date se 48 working hours pehle automatically pay kardega. Incase agar aap kay account mein balance insufficient hoga toh bank iss per aap ko charges apply karega jo kay PKR 1,200 plus 16% FED (Federal Excise Duty) hain.

RDA Funds Transfer / Local Transfer in RDA / Are Local credits allowed in Roshan Accounts?

Dear customer, Account can be fed by Foreign Inward Remittances only originating from the account holder himself/herself through Home remittances or SWIFT, in any currency. Furthermore, below are the options of funds transfer allowed in Roshan Accounts.

​​​​Funds Transfer Allowed

·         PKR RDA to PKR RDA of the same customer in the same bank​

·         ​PKR RDA to FCY RDA of the same customer in same bank

·         ​​Transfer to all accounts in Pakistan except NRP repatriable account (e.g Alfalah NRP account)

·         FCY RDA to PKR RDA of the same customer​

 

Funds Transfe​r not Allowed

·         PKR RDA to other FCY RDAs

·         PKR RDA to FCY RDA of other customers with all banks (including Alfalah)

·         ​PKR RDA to other bank's PKR RDA

·         PKR RDA to NRP repatriable account (e.g Alfalah NRP account)

·         ​FCY RDA to FCY RDA of all banks (including Alfalah)

 

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, Account sirf khud account holder ke zariye home remittances ya SWIFT ke zariye foreign inward remittances ke zariye credit kia ja sakta hai, her kisi currency mein. Iss kay elava, Roshan accounts mein funds transfer karne ke liye neeche options moujood hain.

Mumkin Hai:

·         PKR RDA se PKR RDA mein, same customer same bank mein

·         PKR RDA se FCY RDA mein, same customer same bank mein

·         Tamam accounts mein paisay bhejna Pakistan mein, NRP repatriable account (jaise Alfalah NRP account) ke ilawa

·         FCY RDA se PKR RDA mein, same customer

Mumkin Nahi Hai:

·         PKR RDA se doosre FCY RDA mein

·         PKR RDA se doosre customers ke FCY RDA mein, tamam banks ke saath (jaise Alfalah)

·         PKR RDA se doosre bank ke PKR RDA mein

·         PKR RDA se NRP repatriable account mein (jaise Alfalah NRP account)

·         FCY RDA se tamam banks ke FCY RDA mein (jaise Alfalah)"

 

Cash withdrawal from credit card / Cash advance / Fund transfer from credit card:

English

Dear valued customer, please be informed that you cannot directly transfer funds to any other bank account using Bank Alfalah's credit card. Currently, this feature is not available on Bank Alfalah's credit cards. Additionally, if you wish to receive cash using your credit card, you can submit a request for Credit on Phone (COP). Furthermore, if you choose to withdraw cash by inserting your credit card into an ATM, the bank will impose a cash advance fee, which is either PKR 1,200/- or 3% of the cash advance amount, whichever is higher. Additionally, a mark-up is applied at a rate of 0.12% for each single transaction, calculated from the transaction date and charged on the entire outstanding amount.

URDU:

Moazziz sarif, bank alfalah kay credit card se aap kisi bhi bank account mein direct funds transfer nahi kar sakte hain. Filwaqt bank alflalah kay credit card per yeh feature nahi hai. Mazeed agar aap credit card se cash receive karna chahte hain to aap Credit on phone (COP) ki request forward kar sakte hain.  Mazeed agar aap credit card ko kisi ATM mein enter kar kay cash withdrawal karte hain toh bank aap ko iss per cash advance fee charged karta hai jo kay PKR 1,200/- or 3% of cash advance amount, whichever is higher aur markup charged karta hai jo kay 0.127% her single transaction per transaction date se charge hota hai pore outstanding amount per.

CREDIT ON PHONE

English:

Dear valued customer, Credit on Phone is a facility that allows you to obtain up to 80% of your credit card limit as a pay order. Alternatively, you can also request that this amount be transferred to your BAFL account, which can be paid back through SBS Instalment Plans.

The following charges will be applicable:

Credit on Phone (COP) processing Fee: This is Rs. 1,000 or 2.5% of the transaction amount, whichever is higher plus 16% Federal Excise Duty (FED).

Markup Rate, which is dependent on the tenure of SBS and can range from 3 to 36 months.

The rates are as follows: 3 months: 28.58% 6 months: 31.73% 9 months: 32.79% 12 months: 33.18% 18 months: 33.27% 24 months: 32.99% 30 months: 32.62% 36 months: 32.21%.

If you choose to terminate the Credit on Phone plan, the bank will charge you 5% of the remaining amount or Rs. 1,000, whichever is higher, plus 16% Federal Excise Duty (FED).

URDU:

Moazziz sarif, Credit on Phone ek sahulat hai jiski madad se aap apne credit card ki limit se 80% tak ki raqam ko pay order ke tor par hasil kar sakta hai, Ya yeh bhi darkhwast kar sakta hai ke yeh raqam aap kay BAFL account mein transfer ki jaye, jo ke SBS Installments Plans ke zariye ada kiya ja sakta hai.

Niche diye gaye Charges app ko applicable honge:

Credit on Phone (COP) processing Fee: Jo kay Rs. 1,000 or 2.5% of transaction amount jo value ziyada hogi bank wo charge karega.

Markup Rate, jo SBS kay muddat par mabni hai, jo 3 se 36 mahine tak ho sakti hai.

3 months per 28.58% / 6 months per 31.73% / 9 months per 32.79% / 12 months per 33.18% / 18 months per 33.27% / 24 months per 32.99% / 30 months per 32.62% / 36 months per 32.21%.

Credit on phone plan agar khatam karwate hain: Bank aap ko 5% baqi raqam par ya Rs. 1,000/-, jo bhi zyada ho wo charge karega + 16 % Federal Excise Duty (FED).

 

Credit on phone (COP) request through Alfa app / COP from Alfa app / Steps of COP / How to make COP request from Alfa app:

English

Dear customer, you can forward the request for Credit on Phone by calling our helpline. Additionally, you can also make the request through the Alfa app. The steps for making the request through the Alfa app are provided below.

Our helpline number is 021-111-225-111 / 042-111-225-111

Step 1 Customer will open the App on his Apple / Android Device on Alfa Web (Internet Banking) and will tap on credit card and then credit card functionalities.

Step 2 Customer will tap on Credit on Phone option.

Step 3 Customer will enter/input following detail. · Select payment source (credit card) · Card Expiry Date · Amount · Customer name (Auto populated systematically) · Select Tenure · Annual Markup (will be changed upon selected Tenure).

·         Upon input/selection of above details app will show customer EMI (Equated Monthly Installment)

·         Upon submitting proceed button with correct information. Customer will receive an email on their registered email address containing the first four letters of a random system generated One-Time PIN Code (OTP) while the last five letters will be sent to their registered cell number.

Step 4 Customer will enter the OTAC sent to his updated Email Address & Mobile Number. · Email Code (04 Alpha/Numeric) · SMS Code (04 Alpha/Numeric)

·         Upon submitting proceed button with correct OTACs/OTP. Customer will receive confirmation message to registered email address, Mobile number and will also be shown to customer in next screen.

Alternatively, you can forward your request for a COP by calling our helpline number 021 225 111 / 042 111 225 111. Our customer service representative will be happy to assist you with the process.

Turn Around Time 1 – 2 working days / 24 – 48 hours.

NOTE:

COP request would not be processed for cardholders having relationship lower than 3 months. ​​​

Urdu:

Moazziz sarif, aap Credit on phone ki request hamari helpline per call kar kay forward kar sakte hain mazeed aap Alfa app se bhi kar sakte hain. Alfa app se karne ka steps neeche moujood hai.

Hamari helpline number hai : 021-111-225-111 / 042-111-225-111

Step 1: Customer apnay Apple / Android Device Par App kholay ga Alfa Web (Internet Banking) per aur credit card per tap karega phir credit card ki functionalities per tap karega.

Step 2: Customer Credit on Phone option per tap karega.

Step 3: Customer neechay diye gaye tafseelat dale ga.

• Payment source (credit card) ka intikhab karega

• Card Expiry Date dalega

• Raqam dalega

• Customer ka nam (Auto populated) dalega

• Tenure ka intikhab kijijye

• Saalana Markup (Jo muddat kay mutabik tabdal hoga). Yeh tafseelat enter kay par App customer ko EMI (Equated Monthly Installment) dikhayegi. Saheeh maloomat kay saath proceed button dabaanay par, Customer ko uskay registered email address par aik random system generated One-Time PIN Code (OTP) ke pahlay chaar harf (1st four digits) contain karnay wala email milay ga jabkay pichlay panch harf uskay registered cell number par bheje jayen ge.

Step 4: Customer apne Email Address aur Mobile Number par bheje gaye OTAC enter karenge. • Email Code (04 Alpha/Numeric) • SMS Code (04 Alpha/Numeric) Saheeh OTACs/OTP kay saath proceed button dabaanay par, customer ko registerd email address aur Mobile number par tasdeeq ka paigham milay ga aur yeh bhi customer ko aglay screen per dikhai dega.

Mazeed aap COP ki request hamari helpline se call kar kay bhi karwa sakte hain. Hamari helpline number hai 021 111 225 111 / 042 111 225 111.

Turn Around Time 1 – 2 working days / 24 – 48 hours

NOTE:

COP ki application 3 mahinay se kam arsay ke talluqat wale cardholders ke liye nahi ki jayegi."

 

 

BALANCE TRANSFER FACILITY (BTF):

English:

Dear customer, Balance Transfer Facility: Provides you easy and convenient way to settle payments on all their existing credit cards via (BTF) Facility.

Financing Limit:

·         Minimum financing limit is Rs. 3,000 (subject to availability of credit limit)

·         80% of total limit (for those cardholders who have not yet availed their limit)

Note: Customer can request for BTF on his/her own Credit Card of other bank, it means Beneficiary cannot be different and should be customer himself or herself.

 

The following charges will be applicable:

Balance Transfer Facility (BTF) processing Fee: This is Rs. 600 or 2.5% of the transaction amount, whichever is higher plus 16% Federal Excise Duty (FED).

Markup Rate, which is dependent on the tenure of SBS and can range from 3 to 36 months.

The rates are as follows: 3 months: 26.00% 6 months: 26.00% 9 months: 26.00% 12 months: 26.00% 18 months: 26.00% 24 months: 26.00% 30 months: 26.00% 36 months: 26.00%.

If you choose to terminate the Balance Transfer Facility plan, the bank will charge you 5% of the remaining amount or Rs. 1,000, whichever is higher, plus 16% Federal Excise Duty (FED).

 

URDU:

 

Moazziz sarif, Balance Transfer Facility: Aapko asan aur mufeed tareeqay se tamam mojooda credit cards ki adaigi ke liye (BTF) Facility farahem karta hai.

Financing Limit:

• Minimum financing limit Rs. 3,000 hai (credit limit dastiyab hone par)

• Total limit ka 80% (woh cardholders ke liye jo abhi tak apni limit istemaal nahi ki hui)

Note: Customer apnay Credit Card ke liye BTF ki darkhwast kar sakte hain, customer khud hi hoga.

Niche diye gaye charges lagu honge:

Balance Transfer Facility (BTF) processing Fee: Rs. 600 ya transaction amount ka 2.5%, jo bhi zyada ho, plus 16% Federal Excise Duty (FED) hai.

Markup Rate, jo SBS ki muddat par mabni hai, jo 3 se 36 mahine tak ho sakti hai.

Yeh rates hain: 3 mahine: 26.00%, 6 mahine: 26.00%, 9 mahine: 26.00%, 12 mahine: 26.00%, 18 mahine: 26.00%, 24 mahine: 26.00%, 30 mahine: 26.00%, 36 mahine: 26.00%.

Agar aap Balance Transfer Facility plan ko khatam karna chahte hain, to bank aap se baqi raqam ka 5% ya Rs. 1,000, jo bhi zyada ho, plus 16% Federal Excise Duty (FED) charge karega.

English

Dear customer, you can forward the request for Credit on Phone by calling our helpline. Additionally, you can also make the request through the Alfa app. The steps for making the request through the Alfa app are provided below.

Upon submitting proceed button with correct information. Customer will receive an email on their registered email address containing the first four letters of a random system generated One-Time PIN Code (OTP) while the last five letters will be sent to their registered cell number.

Step 4 Customer will enter the OTAC sent to his updated Email Address & Mobile Number. · Email Code (04 Alpha/Numeric) · SMS Code (04 Alpha/Numeric)

Upon submitting proceed button with correct OTACs/OTP. Customer will receive confirmation message to registered email address, Mobile number and will also be shown to customer in next screen.

 Turn Around Time 1 – 2 working days / 24 – 48 hours

Step 4: Customer apne updated Email Address aur Mobile Number par bheje gaye OTACs (One-Time Authorization Codes) ko enter karenge. • Email Code (04 Alpha/Numeric) • SMS Code (04 Alpha/Numeric)

In OTACs/OTP ko sahi enter karne ke baad, customer ko registered email address aur mobile number par ek confirmation message receive hoga, aur ye bhi customer ko agle screen par dikhaya jayega.

Turn Around Time: 1 - 2 working days / 24 - 48 ghante.

WHT on withdrawal

 

English

Dear customer, please note that Withholding tax has been implemented on cash withdrawal transactions for Non-filer. The rate of 0.6% will be charged on cash withdrawal transaction (ATM & Cash over the counter) those whose name is not appearing in the active taxpayers list on the total amount of Rs. 50,000 exceeding in a day.

·         Withholding tax will be charged on cash withdrawal made through credit cards and Debit cards from ATMs.

·         Withholding tax will be charged on cash over the counter transactions.

·         This tax will be implemented on cash withdrawn from ATM outside Pakistan against credit card issued in Pakistan. 

WHT will not be implemented on: 

·         Withholding tax will not be applicable on payment of cash at the counter of the bank against home remittances received from abroad.

·         Withholding tax will not be applicable on cash withdrawal from ATM in Pakistan against credit card issued outside Pakistan.

·         Withholding tax will not be applicable on Foreign Currency Accounts of Non-filer.

 

URDU

Moazziz sarif, yeh note karen ke Non-filer ke liye cash nikalne ki transactions per Withholding Tax lagu kiya gaya hai. 0.6% ka rate lagu hoga cash withdrawal transactions (ATM aur Counter ke zariye) per, jinki tasdeeq shuda taxpayers list mein naam nahi hai, ek din mein Rs. 50,000 se zyada nikalne par.

·         Withholding tax credit cards aur debit cards se ATM se cash nikalne par lagu hoga.

·         Withholding tax Counter ke zariye cash nikalne ki transactions per lagu hoga.

·         Yeh tax credit card se bahar Pakistan ke ATM se nikalne par bhi lagu hoga, jo Pakistan mein issue kiye gaye credit cards ke liye hai.

WHT is par lagu nahi hoga:

·         Withholding tax laagu nahi hoga agar bank ke counter per ghar se bheji gayi remittances ki payment ho.

·         Withholding tax laagu nahi hoga agar Pakistan mein ATM se credit card ke zariye cash nikala ja raha ho, jo ke bahir se issue hua hai.

·         Non-filer ke foreign currency accounts per Withholding Tax laagu nahi hoga.

Debit Card Activation Journey through Different Channels

 

English

Dear customer, please below have the different channels of debit card activation.

Helpline:

Customer can activate his/her debit card through helpline. Customer just need to call at helpline from register mobile number and activation will be processed accordingly.

WhatsApp:

Customer can now activate Debit Card through WhatsApp as well. Below are the steps

·         Scan the QR code

·         Send Message

·         Accept Terms and Conditions

·         Select 10 for Debit Card Activation

·         Enter Necessary Details

·         Enter OTP (Received on Registered Mobile Number)

·         Pin Generation

Internet Banking:

·         Login to your Internet Banking

·         Click on Services

·         Select Card Management

·         Select Card Type

·         Set Pin

·         Click on Activation

·         Enter OTP (Received on Registered Mobile and Email Address)

Rapid:

·         Visit rapid.alfalah.com

·         Self Service Banking

·         Debit Card Management

·         Enter Necessary Details

·         Enter OTP (Received on Registered Mobile and Email Address)

·         Pin Generation

ALFA App:

·         Login to Alfa App

·         Go to Cards

·         Select Card Management

·         Select Debit Card

·         Tap on Activate

·         Enter 4 Digits pin Code

Debit Card Activation via IVR

·         There has been a new Menu introduced on IVR that is menu no 2. To activate Debit or Credit card press 2.

·         Once customer / user selects (2) – User will be offered more submenus that is (1) for Credit Card Activation and (2) for Debit card activation

·         Once customer selects (2) for Debit card activation then customer will be asked to enter CNIC.

·         In case customer is calling from the registered number, System will ask to enter completed Card Number or otherwise will ask customer to call us from registered number to activate the services.

·         Once Card Number is validated; system will ask customer to enter Year of Birth in YYYY format.

·         Once Year of Birth is validated system will ask customer to enter card expiry date in YYYYMM format.

·         Once Card expiry is validated, OTP is sent to customer, as customer validate OTP, Customer will be given the confirmation that debit card has been activated and a message will also be sent to customer’s registered mobile number.

·         Once card is activated successfully; customer will be asked to enter 4 digits for ATM pin and then re-enter 4 Digits for ATM pin.

·         Once ATM pin is generated the SMS will be sent to customer registered mobile number.

 

ATM

·         You can activate your debit card by visiting any Bank Alfalah ATM with your Alfalah Debit Card, CNIC number and your registered mobile number.

·         Insert your Alfalah Debit Card into the Bank Alfalah ATM Machine.

·         Click ‘OK’ when the ATM machine ask you to activate your Debit Card.

·         Enter your 13-digit CNIC number

·         Enter your date of birth (DD-MM-YYYY)

·         You will receive a 4-digit OTP on your registered mobile number, enter the OTP & proceed

·         Enter a 4-digit ATM PIN of your choice using the keypad

·         Re-enter the ATM PIN for validation

·         You will receive the confirmation message for the Activation of Debit Card, also you will be

·         Intimated via SMS

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, Debit card ko activate karne ke different channels:

Helpline:

Customer apna Debit card helpline se activate kar sakte hain.

Customer ko sirf apne register mobile number se helpline par call karna hai aur activation usi ke mutabiq hogi.

WhatsApp:

Customer ab Credit Card ko WhatsApp ke zariye bhi activate kar sakte hain. Neechay diye gaye steps follow karein:

·         QR code scan karein

·         Message send karein

·         Terms and Conditions accept karein

·         Credit Card Activation ke liye 8 select karein

·         Zaroori details enter karein

·         OTP enter karein (Register Mobile Number par received hone wala)

·         Pin generate karein

Internet Banking:

·         Apne Internet Banking mein login karein

·         Services par click karein

·         Card Management select karein

·         Card Type choose karein

·         Pin set karein

·         Activation par click karein

·         OTP enter karein (Register Mobile aur Email Address par received hone wala)

Rapid:

·         Visit karein rapid.alfalah.com

·         Self Service Banking

·         Debit Card Management

·         Zaroori details enter karein

·         OTP enter karein (Register Mobile aur Email Address par received hone wala)

·         Pin generate karein

ALFA App:

·         Alfa App mein login karein

·         Cards par jayein

·         Card Management select karein

·         Debit Card choose karein

·         Activate par tap karein

·         4-digit pin code enter karein"

Debit Card Activation via IVR:

·         IVR par ek naya menu shamil kiya gaya hai, jo ke menu number 2 hai. Debit ya Credit card ko activate karne ke liye 2 dabain.

·         Jab customer/user (2) select karta hai - usey mazeed submenus milenge, jinme (1) Credit Card Activation ke liye hai aur (2) Debit card activation ke liye hai.

·         Jab customer (2) select karta hai Debit card activation ke liye, to customer se CNIC enter karne ko kaha jayega.

·         Agar customer registered number se call kar raha hai, to system card number pura dalne ko kahega, warna customer se kaha jayega ke woh hamare se registered number se call karein.

·         Jab Card Number validate hota hai, system customer se pochega ke YYYY format mein paidaish saal enter karein.

·         Jab Year of Birth validate hota hai, system customer se kahega ke card expiry date YYYYMM format mein enter karein.

·         Card expiry validate hone ke baad, OTP customer ko bheja jata hai. Jab customer OTP ko validate karta hai, usey confirm kiya jata hai ke debit card activate ho gaya hai, aur ek message bhi customer ke registered mobile number par bheja jata hai.

·         Jab card successfully activate ho jata hai, customer se poocha jata hai ke debit card pin ke liye 4 digits enter karein, phir se 4 digits enter karein.

·         Jab debit card pin generate hota hai, SMS customer ke registered mobile number par bheja jata hai.

 

ATM

·         Ap apna Alfalah Debit Card, CNIC number, or registered mobile number lekar kisi bhi Bank Alfalah ATM par jakar apna debit card activate kar sakte hain.

·         Apna Alfalah Debit Card Bank Alfalah ATM Machine mein daalain.

·         Jab ATM machine apse Debit Card ko activate karne ko kahe, to 'OK' par click karein.

·         Apna 13-digit CNIC number enter karein.

·         Apni paidaish ki taarikh (DD-MM-YYYY) enter karein.

·         Apko apne registered mobile number par ek 4-digit OTP milega, OTP enter karein or aage barhein.

·         Apne pasandeeda 4-digit ATM PIN ko keypad ka istemaal karke enter karein.

·         PIN ko tasdeeq ke liye dubara enter karein.

·         Debit Card ki activation ki tasdeeq mil jayegi, sath hi apko SMS ke zariye bhi agah kiya jayega.

·         Once card is activated successfully; customer will be asked to enter 4 digits for credit card pin and then re-enter 4 Digits for credit card pin.

·         Once credit card pin is generated the SMS will be sent to customer registered mobile number.

Instant Credit Card

English

Dear customer, ETB customers only, who has minimum 50k average balance maintained in BAFL branch and has 1-year relationship with Bank (along with other criteria / checks which system account for during customer journey at ALFA during card application).

You can apply Visa Classic, Visa Gold, Visa Platinum, Visa Ultra, Master Optimus Card Credit card through Instant Credit Card option.

No physical application and documentation is required. This card is approved real-time and can be applied for 24/7 from anywhere in the world.

TAT is 5-10 minutes. The card will be approved real time and is subject to the system / Alfa APP server / Internet response / speed.

 

URDU

Moazziz sarif, sirf ETB (Existing Banking) customers ke liye jo BAFL branch mein kam se kam 50 hazar rupay ka average balance maintain karte hain aur unka Bank ke saath 1 saal ka rishta hai (sath hi dusre criteria/checks bhi hote hain jo system ALFA ke card application ke dauran dekhta hai).

Aap Instant Credit Card option ke zariye Visa Classic, Visa Gold, Visa Platinum, Visa Ultra, Master Optimus Card Credit card ke liye apply kar sakte hain.

Koi tasdeeq ya dastawez ki darkhwast nahi chahiye. Yeh card real-time mein manzoor hota hai aur aap iske liye duniya bhar se 24/7 darkhwast kar sakte hain, kahin bhi.

Turnaround time 5 se 10 minute hai. Card real-time approve hoga aur yeh system/Alfa APP server/Internet response/speed par depend karta hai.

 

Steps for Apply:

English

Dear customer, for apply an Instant Credit Card from Alfa app, please follow the below steps:

·         Login your Alfa app.

·         Tap on Cards.

·         Tap on Apply for Instant Credit Card.

·         Dear customer, if you are interested then please tap on YES or not interested please tap on LATER.

·         Tap on Apply for Credit Card (New).

·         Select the Card Type.

·         Please enter your KYC info.

·         Please enter your Embossing & Reference Info.

·         Please select the limit and card.

·         Please submit the SBP Undertaking.

·         Please read T&C and agree, review SOC, Auth Letter & enter OTAC.

 

Important Points

·         Only ETB (account holder) customer is eligible for ICC having 6 months’ average balance of 50k with 1 year BAFL relationship.

·         Customers that are ineligible get the pop up that they are ineligible.

·         TAT would be 3 to 5 working days for card embossing and delivery.

·         Card embossing TAT is 1 working day (the next day of customer applying).

·         Preferred mailing address for delivery is postal address which will be entered by customer. It is auto filled but customer can edit it.

·         ECIB/ system check points is performed during the journey only i.e. before the OTAC, if customer reached to OTAC, this means card will be approved however, if there is any issue in system checks, error will appear to the customer before reaching to OTAC.

·         Customer cannot skip auto debit feature.

·         If customer is having a VISA credit card then he/she can apply for Master/Ultra Card, existing card type won’t be appearing to the customers.

·         Application processing to approval TAT is 5-10 minutes. Embossing & Delivery has their standard TAT(s)

·         Documents are not required for instant credit card as this is for BAFL existing customers

·         Customer apply for Credit card through ALFA only.

·         Any ETB customer, who has registered his/her ALFA through any mean (Account, debit card, credit card, orbits, wallet)

·         Sample SMS sent to customers at the time of applying/approval

·         Customer can directly email at instant.card@bankalfalah.com for any assistance.

·         Customers by themselves can check that credit card request is processed or not through Alfa.

·         Age requirement is minimum 21 and maximum 60 years. There is no salary / business segment. There is only requirement that customer must maintain 6 months’ average balance 50K and has 1-year relationship with BAFL

·         If has good repayment history, can apply for CLI (Credit Limit Enhancement) After 6 months. Whereas, maximum time to become eligible for limit enhancement is 12 months.

·         RDA customers are also eligible as per defined criteria for ETB customers only.

 

URDU

Moazziz sarif, Alfa app se Instant Credit Card ke liye application karnay ke liye, neechay diye gaye steps ko follow karen:

·         Apne Alfa app mein login karen.

·         Cards par tap karen.

·         Apply for Instant Credit Card par tap karen.

·         Moazziz sarif, agar aap dilchaspi rakhte hain toh YES par tap karen ya agar dilchaspi nahi hai toh LATER par tap karen.

Important Points:

·         Sirf ETB (account holder) customer hai jo 6 mahinay ki average balance 50k aur 1 saal ki BAFL rishtay mein hain, woh Instant Credit Card ke liye eligible hain.

·         Jo customer iss se ineligible hain, unko pop-up milega ke woh ineligible hain.

·         Card embossing aur delivery ke liye TAT 3 se 5 working days hai.

·         Card embossing ka TAT 1 working day hai (customer apply karne ke agle din).

·         ECIB/system checks sirf journey ke doran kiye jate hain, yani OTAC se pehle. Agar customer OTAC tak pohanch gaye hain, toh yeh matlab hai ke card approve ho jayega, lekin agar system checks mein koi issue hai toh customer OTAC tak pohanchne se pehle hi error dekhein gay.

·         Application processing se approval TAT 5-10 minutes hai. Embossing & Delivery ke apne standard TATs hain.

·         Documents instant credit card ke liye zaroori nahi hain kyun ke yeh sirf BAFL ke maujooda customer ke liye hai.

·         Customer direct taur par instant.card@bankalfalah.com par email kar sakte hain agar koi madad ki zaroorat hai.

·         Customer khud Alfa se check kar sakte hain ke unki credit card ki request process hui hai ya nahi.

·         Umar ki shart minimum 21 aur maximum 60 saal hai. Salary/business segment nahi hai, sirf yeh shart hai ke customer ke paas 6 mahinay ki average balance 50K aur 1 saal ki BAFL relationship honi chahiye.

·         Agar acha repayment history hai toh 6 mahinay baad CLI (Credit Limit Enhancement) ke liye apply kar sakte hain. Jahan tak limit enhancement ke liye eligible honay ka waqt hai, woh 12 mahinay hai.

·         RDA customers bhi ETB customers ke liye mukarar sharton ke mutabiq eligible hain.

Instant loan

English

Dear customer, if you are not eligible for an instant loan, a pop-up appears, forwarding your personal loan lead to the concern department. Furthermore, if you are eligible for an instant loan, the loan amount is credited to your account within 10 minutes.

 

The eligibility criteria for an instant loan are as follows:

• Customers must have a conventional account with Bank Alfalah.

• The average balance for the past 6 months should be more than 50,000.

• Customers must have a one-year relationship with Bank Alfalah.

• If customers are obtaining a loan/financing from any other bank, there should be no default.

For Apply:

Login Alfa app.

Step 1a – If Banner does not appear – Choose Loan Option to apply Instant Cash from Loan Menu.

Step 1a – Enter CNIC Issuance Date

Step 1 b – Enter KYC Required details with correct father name as mentioned on CNIC (please note that if details mismatched with NADRA or CNIC expired or HOLD by NADRA or FAILED BY NADRA for any reason –

Journey will be ended here automatically with top-up window “You are not eligible for this loan”. Same time BAFL Screening will also be called at back-end. Customer may also decline by BAFL screening (if match found).

Step 2 – Select Loan Amount, Tenor and Account to be auto debited – If DBR is high, Loan will be rejected.

Step 3 – Enter Personal Details.

Step 4 – Enter Financial Details (CF1 Form – required by regulator):

Step 5 – Accept T& C, enter OTAC (received on registered Mobile # and email ID).

Next day, Customer may check repayment schedule by clicking on LOAN – Instant Cash overview

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, agar aap instant loan kay liye eligible nahi hote hain toh aap ko pop up show hota hai jis mein aap ki personal loan ki lead concern department ko forward ki jati hai. Mazeed agar aap instant loan kay liye eligible hote hain toh aap ka loan amount aap kay account mein 10 minutes mein credit hojata hai.

Eligiblity Criteria instant loan ka neeche mentioned kia gaya hai:

•             Customers ka Bank Alfalah mein conventional account lazmi hai.

•             6 months ka average balance 50,000 se ziyada hona chahiye.

•             Customers ka Bank Alfalah kay sath ek saal ka relationship hona lazmi hai.

•             Customer agar kisi bhi bank se loan / financing kar rahe hain toh us mein default nahi hona chahiye.

 

Apply karne ka taeeqakar:

Alfa app mein login karen.

Step 1a – Agar banner nazar nahi aaye to - Loan Menu se Instant Cash ke liye apply karen.

Step 1a – CNIC Issuancey Ki Tarikh Daalen

Step 1b – Durust walid ka naam, CNIC per mentioned walid ka naam aur KYC ki zaroori malumat daalen (dhyan rahe ke agar malumat NADRA ke mutabiq nahi milti ya CNIC muddat guzar chuki hai ya NADRA ne hold kiya hua hai ya kisi bhi wajah se NADRA ne nakam kar diya hai –

Toh journey yahen end ho jayegi, otac window ke sath “Aap is loan ke liye eligible nahi hain” ka pop up bhi hoga. Isi doran BAFL Screening bhi backend par call ki jayegi. Customer BAFL screening ko bhi inkar kar sakta hai (agar match milta hai).

Step 2 – Loan rakam, muddat aur account select kijiye khud-ba-khud cut jayega – agar DBR zyada hai to loan cancel ho jayega.

Step 3 – Personal malumat enter karen.

Step 4 – Financial Details enter karen (CF1 Form – required by regulator):

Step 5 – Shara'it aur sharton ko tasdeeq karen, OTAC (jo registered mobile # aur email ID per milta hai) enter karen.

Next day, customer repayment schedule check kar sakte hain LOAN – Instant Cash overview.

Definition of BOT

English

Urdu

A WhatsApp BOT is a software solution that can automatically perform routine tasks and respond to inquiries with minimal human intervention. It helps to streamline operations and enhance the customer experience by providing prompt and efficient assistance.

WhatsApp BOT aik software hai jo khud bakhud mamool ke kaam injaam day sakta hai aur kam se kam insani mudakhlat ke sath pooch gach ka jawab day sakta hai. Yeh fori aur mo-asar madad faraham karkay operations ko hamwar karne aur customer ke tajarbay ko badhaane mein madad karta hai .

Account Balance Inquiry

 

Account Balance Inquiry

English

Urdu

Dear Customer, you can check your account balance by using the WhatsApp automated service by providing few details. If you like to use the WhatsApp automated service, this chat will be closed, then you can start a new chat. Select the relevant option and check your account balance.

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna account balance WhatsApp automated service use karty hoye check kar sakty hain chand details provide kar ke. Agar ap WhatsApp automated service use karna chahty hain to mujhy apki ye chat close karni hogi phir ap new chat start kar ke relevant option select kr ke apna account balance check kar skty hain.

Step by step, guide to check Account Balance is mentioned below:

Step by step account balance check karny ka mentioned tareeqa ye hai:

Access Bank Alfalah’s WhatsApp BOT

Bank Alfalah ke WhatsApp BOT ko access karain

From main menu, select option 1 for Banking Services

Main menu se option 1 for Banking Services ko select karein

Select Option 3 “Account Balance Enquiry”

Option 3 “Account Balance Enquiry” ko select karein

Enter the One-Time Password (OTP) that you will receive on your registered mobile number

Apko apnay registered mobile number par OTP enter karna hoga

Select the desired account for which you want to check the balance

Woh account Select karein jiska account balance check karna chahte hain

Select Option 1 “Account Balance”

Option 1 “Account Balance” ko select karein

Your Account balance will reflect accordingly

Apka account balance accordingly reflect hojyga

You can also check your account balance by using online banking service (Alfa App/Internet Banking) or by calling at our helpline 042/021-111 225-111.

Note : Dear customer, if you have a Bank Alfalah Alfa Wallet Account, you cannot check the balance through the WhatsApp BOT.

Mazeed ap apna account balance online banking ko use karty hoye (Alfa App/Internet Banking) ya phir helpline par call karty hoye bhi maloom kar skty hain. Hamari helpline number hai 042/021-111-225-111.

Note: Moazziz sarif, agar aap ka Bank Alfalah mein Alfa Wallet Account hai toh aap WhatsApp BOT se balance check nahi kar sakte hain.

Debit Card Activation

 

Debit Card Activation

English

Urdu

Dear Customer, you can activate your debit card by using our WhatsApp automated service, Alfa app, Internet Banking, Alfalah Rapid and by calling at our helpline 021/042-111-225-111.

Muaziz Saarif, ap apna Debit Card WhatsApp automated service, Alfa App,Internet Banking, Alfalah Rapid  aur helpline 021/042 111 225 111 par call kar ke bhi activate karwa skty hain.

To activate your debit card via Bank Alfalah's WhatsApp BOT service. Here are the instructions in a step-by-step format:

Agar aap activate karna chahte hain apna debit card WhatsApp BOT se toh kindly neeche diye gae steps ko follow kijiye:

Access Bank Alfalah's WhatsApp BOT service from your registered mobile number

Apny registered mobile number ke through Bank Alfalah ki WhatsApp BOT service access karain

From the main menu, select option 10 for Debit Card Activation

Main menu sey debit card activation ke lye option 10 select karain

Enter the last four digits of your Account Number (e.g. 2387)

Apny Account Number ke last 4 digits enter kjiye (e.g. 2387)

Enter the last four digits of your CNIC number (e.g. 7859)

Apny CNIC number ke last four digits enter kjiye (e.g. 7859)

Enter the year of birth e.g. 1986 (YYYY)

Apni year of birth enter kjiye e.g. 1986 (YYYY)

Enter the last four digits of your Debit Card (e.g. 2387)

Apny debit card ky last four digits enter kijiye (e.g. 2387)

Enter the One-Time Password (OTP) that you receive on your registered mobile number (OTP will expire in 10 minutes)

Apny registered number par sent kiya gaya OTP enter karain (OTP 10mins mein expire hojayga)

Enter the four-digit debit card PIN code that you wish to use

Apni marzi ka 4 digits Debit Card PIN Code enter kjiye

Re-enter the same four-digit PIN code for confirmation

Debit Card ke 4 digits PIN Code tasdeeq ke lye dubara enter karain

The BOT will provide a confirmation message for debit card activation, and you will receive an SMS notification

BOT ki janib sy apko Debit Card Activation ka confirmation message send kiya jayga mazeed apko SMS ke through bhi aagha kiya jayga

*Please note that the chat needs to be initiated from your registered mobile number to activate your debit card via Bank Alfalah's WhatsApp BOT service*

 

 *WhatsApp BOT services ke through Debit Card Activation ke lye apko chat registered number sey start karni hogi*

Biller Charges

English

Dear Customer, when you make the payment for Bank Alfalah's credit card through another bank's digital channels, it incurs bank charges, which depend on the amount you are paying. Further details regarding the charges are mentioned below:

·         Up to Rs. 10K - Rs. 10/-

·         10K+ to 100K - Rs. 25/-

·         100K+ to 250K - Rs. 50/-

·         250K+ to 1Mln - Rs. 100

·         1 Mln+ - Rs. 200/

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, jab aap bank alfalah kay credit card ki payment kisi dosre bank ki digital channels se pay karte hain toh iss per bank charges charged karta hai, Jo kay amount per depend karta hai kay aap kitna amount pay kar rahe hain. Charges ki mazeed details neeche mentioned hain:

·         Up to Rs. 10K - Rs. 10/-

·         10K+ to 100K - Rs. 25/-

·         100K+ to 250K - Rs. 50/-

·         250K+ to 1Mln - Rs. 100

·         1 Mln+ - Rs. 200/

Features and benefits of Bank Alfalah

 

English

Bank Alfalah offer a range of features and benefits, few are mentions below:

·         Savings and Checking Accounts: Facilities to save money and manage daily transactions.

·         Interest Earnings: Interest accrual on savings, helping your money grow.

·         Loans and Mortgages: Bank Alfalah offers access to loans for various needs, including home loans, personal loans, auto loan and more.

·         Credit Cards: Convenience for transactions, rewards, and building credit.

·         Investment Opportunities: Options to invest in stocks, bonds, mutual funds, etc.

·         Online and Mobile Banking: Easy access to manage accounts, transfer money, and pay bills digitally.

·         Security: Assurance of deposit safety, fraud protection, and privacy measures.

·         Financial Planning Services: Expert advice and services for wealth management and financial planning.

·         ATM and Branch Network: Wide access to ATMs and branches 1000+ for convenient banking.

·         Customer Support: Assistance and support services for various banking needs. These features may vary among different banks and their offerings.

Urdu

·         Bank Alfalah apne customers ko kai features aur faiday faraham karta hai, kuch neechay zikar kiye gae hain:

·         Saving aur Current Accounts: Paisa bachanay aur rozana ki transactions ko manage karne ki sahulat.

·         Interest Kamai: Bachat par mufaad hasil karna jo aapke paisay ko barhata hai.

·         Loans aur Mortgages: Bank Alfalah ki taraf se mukhtalif zarurat ko pura karne ke liye loans ka aasan raasta, jaise ghar ke loans, personal loans, auto loans aur aur bhi.

·         Credit Cards: Transactions, inaam aur credit banane ke liye asaanai.

·         Investment Mouqaat: Stocks, bonds, mutual funds etc. mein invest karne ke options.

·         Online aur Mobile Banking: Hisaabon ka asaan taur par manage karna, paisa transfer karna, aur bills digital tareekay se pay karna.

·         Security: Jama ki hue raqm ki protection, fraud protection aur privacy measures ki guarantee.

·         Financial Planning Services: Maaliyat ki nigrani aur maali planning ke liye mahir mashwaray aur services.

·         ATM aur Branch Network: 1000+ ATMs aur branches ka wide access jinse banking asaan hojati hai.

·         Customer Support: Mukhtalif banking zarurat ko pura karne ke liye madad aur support ki sahulat. Ye features alag-alag banks aur unke offerings mein farq kar sakte hain.

Zakat Deduction

English

Dear customer, if you do not wish to have Zakat deducted from your account, kindly visit your parent branch and submit the Zakat Exemption form (CZ-50).

You can download the CZ-50 form through the Alfa app. Follow the steps below:

·         Log in to the Alfa app.

·         Tap on "Save and Invest."

·         Select "Alfa Term Deposit."

·         Download the CZ-50 form.

For Alfa Term Deposit you can email the CZ-50 form at Zakat@bankalfalah.com for Zakat Exemption.

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, agar aap apne account se Zakat deduct nahi karwana chahte hain toh iss hawale se aap apni parent branch visit kijiye aur Zakat Exemption form (CZ-50) submit kijiye.

CZ-50 form aap Alfa app se download kar sakte hain.

Steps neeche mentioned hain:

·         Login kijiye Alfa app per.

·         Tap kijiye Save and Invest per.

·         Tap kijiye Alfa Term Deposit per.

·         Download kijiye CZ-50 form.

Alfa Term Deposit kay liye aap CZ-50 form email kar sakte hain Zakat@bankalfalah.com per.

BNPL

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, Alfa BNPL by Bank Alfalah ek Shariah Compliant installment service hai jo customers se 0% profit charge karta hai aur ye customers ko dusre bank credit cards se AlfaMall ya kisi aur Bank Alfalah registered online ya in-store merchant se products khareedne ki facility deta hai.

Tamam customers jo kisi bhi Pakistani bank se jari kisi bhi credit card ka hamil hain, woh Alfa BNPL 'Buy Now Pay Later' facility se faida utha sakte hain (Bank Alfalah ki andaruni assessment ke mutabiq), siwaye Bank Alfalah jari kiye gaye cards ke.

Alfa BNPL kaise kaam karta hai?

Moazziz sarif, Alfa BNPL aap ko yeh mauqa deta hai ke aap products khareedain aur tawajju dain payment ko barqarar rakhne ke liye her mahine ki qistoon mein ada karain, jin ka muddat 4 se 12 mahine tak ho sakti hai. Iss transaction mein, pehla adaegi pehle hi le li jati hai. Customers is facility ka istemal kar sakte hain agar unke pas kisi bhi Pakistan mein mojood bank ka credit card hai, jo ke adaegi ke tor par istemaal hoga. Bank pehle tafseelat daikh kar fauran yeh faisla karta hai ke customer ka istemal mumkin hai ya nahi. Jab customer on-board ho jata hai, usko ek had mukarrar ki jati hai jise woh Alfamall, online aur in-store merchants per ja kar istemal kar sakte hain. Yeh transaction ek tri-party execution par mabni hoti hai, jisme bank merchant ke liye broker ka kaam karta hai, merchant products bech kar bechne wale ban jata hai aur customer bank ka debtor ban jata hai. Bank customer ke naam par purchase amount merchant ko ada karti hai.

Main apna order kaise Cancel karun?

Moazziz sarif, Order cancellation ka faisla marchant ki policy par mabni hoga. Agar aapne AlfaMall se shopping ki hai toh mazeed tafseelat ke liye yahan click karein https://alfamall.com/alfamallhelp/index/register . Agar kisi aur online merchant se ki hai toh unki cancelation policy unke website par di gayi hogi. AlfaMall sirf order placement ke 24 ghanton ke andar product/order ko cancel karne ki ijaazat deta hai.

Agar aap Alfa BNPL ke zariye order purchase nahi kar pa rahe hain, to iske kuch mukhtalif reasons ho sakti hain

English

Dear customer, Alfa BNPL by Bank Alfalah is a Shariah Compliant instalment facility that charges 0% profit from customers and enables customers having other bank credit cards to purchase products from AlfaMall or any other Bank Alfalah registered online or in-store merchant.

All customers holding other bank credit cards (issued by any bank in Pakistan) can avail the Alfa BNPL ‘Buy Now Pay Later’ facility (subject to Bank Alfalah internal assessment), except for Bank Alfalah issued cards.

Alfa BNPL allows customer to purchase products and defer the payment by paying in equal monthly installment for tenor ranging from 4 to 12 months. In this transaction, the first payment is taken upfront. Customers can avail this facility by linking eligible credit cards from any bank in Pakistan to be used as the mode of payment. The bank first assesses the customer and provides instant decisioning on eligibility. Once the customer is on-boarded, they are assigned a limit which they can use by going to Alfamall, eligible online and in-store merchants. The transaction is based on a tri-party execution where the bank acts as a broker for the merchant, the merchant becomes the seller by selling the products and the customer becomes the debtor of the bank. The Bank pays the purchase amount to the merchant on behalf of the customer.

Account opening Charges

English

Dear customer, charges are applicable for the services you avail on your account, such as debit card, cheque book, SMS alerts, and so on. There are no charges for account opening. Additionally, an initial deposit is required at the time of account opening, from which fees for your card and cheque book are deducted, and the remaining amount is maintained as your account balance.

If you open a Kamyab Karobar Account in the Current Account and maintain a Monthly Average Balance of 50,000, the Bank does not charge you fees for SMS Alerts, Debit Card - Silver/ Gold (Both Issuance & Annual Fee). You are exempt from the fees for these services.

Mazeed agar aap Current Account mein Kamyab Karobar Account open karte hain aur apna Monthly Average Balance 50,000 Maintain rakhte hain toh Bank aap ko SMS Alerts, Debit Card - Silver/ Gold (Both Issuance & Annual Fee) ki fee charged nahi karta hai. Aap ko in services ki fee exempt hojati hai.

Biometric Service on ATM and CCDM

English

Dear customer, this is to inform you that Bank Alfalah is pleased to announced a new "ATM Biometric Service" where customer can subscribe with annual recurring charges and avail additional limit of upto PKR 1 million per day on card less transactions through ATM / CCDM.

Biometric Subscription Process:

Customer visits the Bank Alfalah ATM and press any key on ATM to initiate cardless transactions.

·         Select the option "Annual Biometric Package".

·         After that Customer will input CNIC number, OTP & Biometric.

·         Next customer will select the account on which he/she want to activate services. (if multiple account only one account can be selected for service).

·         After Customer Select Account, customer will be displayed screen with fee information & Terms and Conditions.

·         Once Customer accepts conditions, customer will press proceed and customer account will be debited of Fee amount as per SOC and customer will be informed of subscription.

 

Biometric Subscribed Customer Limit:

·         Single Transaction Cash Withdrawal: PKR. 200,000*.

·         Daily Cash Withdrawal: PKR. 1,000,000.

·         FT/IBFT/UBP: PKR. 1,000,000.

*Service limit is only available on Alfalah ATM and only Biometric ATM Service Subscriber can avail above limit.

Biometric Subscription Annual Fee:

·         PKR 2500 +FED per annum (subscription based service)

·         Renews annually automatically unless un-subscribe

 

 

Annual Fee Deduction Process:

 

·         Annual fee will be deducted from customer account on first working day of anniversary month.

·         Customer will be sent a confirmation SMS with details of annual fee deduction.

·         If required fee is unavailable in customers account, an alert message (SMS) will be sent to customer to add required amount in his subscribed account for continuation of services.

·         If amount is not available in account on 2nd week (service will be terminated and customer will be intimated through text message of service termination.

·         If customer wants to continue service after termination, he/she will have to re-subscribe and charges will be deducted as per process.

 

 

Un-Subscription Process:

·         If customer call at helpline for unsubscribe Biometric ATM Service, officer will forward an email to Team Leaders with customer details till further instructions.

 

Important Points:

 

·         Individual account holder with active account and no restriction (such as debit/Credit block, dormant account etc.) can only avail this service.

·         Biometric Onboarding Subscription is account based only.

·         OTP will only be sent through an SMS to Customer's mobile number as registered with the Bank Alfalah.

·         ln case if customer verification is failed, transaction shall be terminated

·         This service will not impact any Transaction limit performed by Debit Card.

·         Debit card is not required to avail this service, as this is account based service.

·         Photo Account holders can also avail this service.

·         Service is available only on Bank Alfalah ATMs.

·         Joint Account Holders and Sole Proprietors are not allowed to avail this service.

·         If customer account is marked deceased, account is blocked so he can’t avail the services.

·         Tap on send money.

·         Click on Other Banks.

·         Click on “+” to add new payee.

·         Select the bank of new payee.

·         Select from Account and in to Account click on Scan QR.

·         Crop picture to capture the QR.

·         Details are auto-filled. If static QR, enter amount. In dynamic, amount is auto-filled too.

·         Review details and confirm payment.

 

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, neechay diye gae tareeqay se QR ke zariye dusre banks mein funds transfer karne ka tareeqa hai:

·         Apne Alfa app mein login karen.

·         "Send money" par tap karen.

·         "Other Banks" par click karen.

·         " + " par click karke naye payee ko add karen.

·         Naye payee ki bank select karen.

·         From Account select karen aur to Account mein QR scan karne ke liye "Scan QR" par click karen.

·         QR capture karne ke liye picture ko crop karen.

·         Details auto-fill hojayenge. Agar static QR hai toh amount enter karen, dynamic mein amount auto-fill hojayega.

Details ko review karen aur payment confirm karen.

Dear customer, Bank Alfalah Credit Card is a small Plastic Payment Card that provides Cardholders Electronic access for purchasing of Goods/Services on Credit. It gives you access to line of credit which you can buy now & pay later.

Urdu

Eligibility Criteria

For Salaried Persons:

·         Application Form

·         CNIC

·         Latest Salary Slip/Certificate

·         50,000 salary required for all cards.

·         Age required Min. 21 years Max. 60 years for Basic and 13 years no maximum age limit for Supplementary.

·         3 months Bank Statement for unapproved companies.

·         Debt Burden All income segments 40%.

For Self-Employed:

·         Application Form

·         CNIC

·         6-month Bank Statement

·         Proprietorship letter or proof of business

·         75,000 average account balance.

·         Age required Min. 21 years Max. 70 years for Basic and 13 years no maximum age limit for Supplementary.

·         Debt Burden All income segments 40%

Important Points for Reversal Criteria:

 

English

Dear customer, please below have the important points of reversal criteria:

·         The customer must complete one of the two spending criteria for annual fee reversal.

·         The customer may apply for reversal on an annual basis after annual fee is charged.

·         The promotional period for spending starts after annual fee is charged to the account.

·         Spending may be performed on either Basic or Supplementary card.

·         Upon meeting the criteria within 2 months, the customer may request the reversal via call center no longer than 3 months from the date when annual fee was charged.

·         FED will not be reversed.

·         Only Retail Spend and Cash Advance will be considered as eligible spend.

·         UBP, Alfa Mall transactions, SBS, OSBS, COP, BTF are not included in spending.

URDU

Moazziz sarif, neechay diye gaye reversal criteria ke important points:

·         Customer ko saalana fee reversal ke liye do mein se kisi ek spending criteria ko pura karna zaroori hai.

·         Customer saalana fee charge hone ke baad saalana basis par reversal ke liye apply kar sakta hai.

·         Spending ka promotional duration saalana fee charge hone ke baad shuru hota hai.

·         Spending Basic ya Supplementary card par kiya ja sakta hai.

·         Criteria ko 2 mahine ke andar pura karne par, customer ko annual fee charge hone ke din se, 3 mahine tak call center ke zariye reversal ke liye darkhwast kar sakti hai.

·         FED ka reversal nahi hoga.

·         Sirf Retail Spend aur Cash Advance ko maana jayega eligible spend ke taur par.

·         UBP, Alfa Mall transactions, SBS, OSBS, COP, BTF spending mein shamil nahi honge.

 

 

 

Credit Limit Increase (CLI)

 

Eligibility Criteria

English

Dear customer, please below have the Eligibility Criteria of Credit Card Limit Enhancement:

·         CLI will occur for customers upon customer request (part of CF1/declaration form).

·         At least 12 months’ credit card relationship is required in order to qualify.

·         Card should be active & open, current or aging 1 at the time of limit increase.

·         Only one CLI is allowed within a 12 months’ period.

·         TAT processing of request is 9 Working days. Department calculate the TAT from date of request subject to Complete to completion of supporting documents.

Urdu

·         Moazziz sarif, mentioned kiye gaya hai Credit Card Limit Enhancement ki Eligibility Criteria:

·         CLI (Credit Limit Increase) customer ki darkhwast par hoga (CF1/declaration form).

·         Qualify karne ke liye kam az kam 12 mahine ki credit card relationship zaroori hai.

·         Card active aur open hona chahiye, current ya aging 1 hona chahiye limit increase ke waqt.

·         12 mahine ke doran sirf aik CLI allow hai.

·         Request ki TAT processing 9 Working days hai. Department request ki date se TAT calculate karta hai, jab tak supporting documents puray na ho jayein.

 

Procedure of Limit Enhancement

English

Dear customer, to request a credit card limit increase, follow the procedure below:

For Salaried Person:

·         Fresh Income Documents verified and stamped (Salary Slip)

·         Signed Annexure CF 1 http://www.sbp.org.pk/bprd/2009/Annex_C4.pdf

·         Latest six months duly signed & stamped salaried account bank statement.

For Self Employee:

·         Sole Proprietorship letter (In case of Sole Proprietor and Business Account Statement)

·         Partnership Deed (In case of Partnership)

·         Form A for private limited firm (PVT LTD) (form 29) also included in Pvt.

·         Properly filled declaration form/CF1 (copy attached)

Send the application to the BDU department at the following address: BDU Department 23-H, Gulberg 2- 4th floor, Lahore.

Once the bank receives your application, they will process your request for a limit enhancement.

 

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, credit card limit increase ki darkhwast karnay neeche mentioned kiye gae procedure follow kijiye:

Salaried Person ke liye:

·         Fresh Income Documents jo verified aur stamped hon (Salary Slip)

·         Sign kiya hua Annexure CF 1 http://www.sbp.org.pk/bprd/2009/Annex_C4.pdf

·         6 mahinay ke sahih taur par sign aur stamped salary account ki bank statement.

Self-Employee ke liye:

·         Sole Proprietorship letter (Agar aap Sole Proprietor hain aur Business Account Statement)

·         Partnership Deed (Agar Partnership hai)

·         Form A for private limited firm (PVT LTD) (form 29) jo Pvt mein shamil hai.

·         Properly filled declaration form/CF1 (copy attached)

Application ko BDU department ke address par bhejen: BDU Department 23-H, Gulberg 2- 4th floor, Lahore.

Jab bank aapki application receive karegi, woh aapki limit enhancement ki darkhwast ko process karegi.

Minimum Payment Calculation:

·         Stage 1 – {statement outstanding balance – over limit amount (if any) – SBS installment (if any)} * 1%.

·         Stage 2 – Over limit amount (if any) + SBS installment (if any) + all fees and charges (if any)

·         Stage 3 – Past Due (if any)

FAQs

 

English

What is credit limit?

English

Credit limit is the maximum amount of credit approved through underwriting by Bank Alfalah

Urdu

Credit limit Bank Alfalah ke underwriting ke zariye manzoori pai jane wali maximum amount hai.

What is Alfalah credit cover facility?

English

With the Alfalah Credit Cover, customer is insured against any unfortunate temporary or permanent disability or death. Alfalah Credit Cover allows payment of the outstanding monthly amount in case of temporary disability and in the unfortunate event of cardholders’ death coverage twice the amount of outstanding provided debt. Credit up Cover facility is available for a minimal fee, charged automatically on the card balance every month as per SOC.
Note: Maximum age to attain this facility is 75 years and after that age bank cancelled the Credit Cover Premium (CCP)

Urdu
Alfalah Credit Cover ke zariye, customer ko kisi bhi temporary or permanent disability ya death ke duran insurance di jati hai. Alfalah Credit Cover death ya temporary disability ke case mein mahana baqi raqam ki adaeegi ki ijazat deta hai aur cardholders ki death ke duran outstanding amount ki muddat do guna barhata hai. Credit up Cover saholat minimum fees ke sath dastiyab hai, jo SOC ke mutabiq har mahine card balance par khud ba khud lagai jati hai.

Note: Is saholat ko hasil karne ki maximum umar 75 saal hai aur us umar ke baad bank Credit Cover Premium (CCP) ko cancelled kar deta hai.

How much maximum limit can I avail on credit limit?

English

Your credit limit is the maximum amount of credit approved in writing by Alfalah VISA having 10% cushion charges. It is the amount that can be accessed through your credit card account.

Urdu

Aapki credit Limit Alfalah VISA ke maximum approved amount, jisme 10% cushion charges shamil hain. Ye woh raqam hai jo aapke credit card account se haasil ki ja sakti hai.

 What are billing cycle dates for Credit Card?

Urdu

what is meant by Arbitration Charges & Voucher retrieval fee?

English

Retrieval charges pertain to the charges billed to the customer in case where the dispute has gone against the customer

Arbitration charges pertain to the charges billed to the customer when the dispute after being debated by the Issuer and Acquirer is forwarded to the Franchise for final decision​

Urdu

Retrieval charges aisi charges hain jo customer ke khilaaf faisla hua hai, uss halat mein customer ko bheje jate hain.

Arbitration charges woh charges hote hain jo customer ko bill kiye jate hain jab dispute jo issuer dainay wale aur qabool karne wale ke darmiyan ho, woh Franchise ke liye aakhri faisla lenay ke liye forward ki jati hai.

Can Customer avail COP against Islamic Account (IBFT)?

English

COP credit is not allowed to disburse directly in IBG customers' accounts, however, IBG customers may submit the pay order issued for the purpose, at any bank including IBG counters.​

Urdu

COP credit IBG customer ke accounts mein disburse karne ke liye ijazat nahi hai, lekin IBG customer ye maqsad ke liye jari kiye gaye pay order ko kisi bhi bank mein, IBG counters shamil hain, jama karwa sakte hain.

Which email address for receiving credit card statement?

E-Statements will be sent from BAL e-mail ID i.e. e.statement@bankalfalah.com

What is the insurance coverage under Basic Death Benefit?

If an insured customer dies, then EFU Life will pay the outstanding balance

Agar koi bima shuda customer death ho jaaye toh EFU Life baqi raqam ada karega.

Debit Card
