How to apply? / E-debit / edebit

 

English

Dear customer, you can only apply for a new debit card online or submit a request through the branch for card. If you want to forward a card replacement request, please call our helpline. Our general banking helpline is 021-111-225-111 or 042-111-225-111. Our premier banking helpline is 021-111-225-226. Our Roshan Digital Account helpline is 009221 111 225 226. Our branchless banking (wallet / EOBI customer) helpline is 021-111-225-229.

You can apply for a fresh debit card online through the following link:

If you have a conventional account with Bank Alfalah, click on the link below: https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Home.aspx

If you have an Islamic account with Bank Alfalah, click on the link below: https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Index.aspx

Furthermore, if you send a message 'Debit' to 8287 from your mobile, the department will contact you within 48 working hours to initiate the request for your fresh debit card.

You can also apply through our WhatsApp Banking BOT.

Follow the steps below:

·         Access Bank Alfalah’s WhatsApp BOT.

·         Select option 1 ‘Banking services’.

·         Select option 1 ‘Cards’.

·         Select option 1 ‘Debit Cards’.

·         Select option 3 ‘Apply Debit Card’.

·         Confirm with 'Yes' or 'No'.

You will receive a call from the department within 48 working hours, where your application will be forwarded.

 

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, aap sirf new debit card online apply kar sakte hain aur branch se bhi request forward kar sakte hain. Agar card ki replacement request forward karna chahte hain toh iss hawale se aap hamari helpline per call kijiye.

Hamari helpline general banking ki 021-111-225-111 ya 042-111-225-111.

Hamari helpline permier banking ki 021-111-225-226.

Hamari helpline Roshan Digital Account ki 009221 111 225 226.

Hamari Branchless banking (wallet / EOBI customer) kie helpline 021-111-225-229.

Fresh debit card aap neeche diye gae link se online apply karenge.

Agar aap ka conventional account hai Bank Alfalah mein toh neeche diye gae link mein click kijiye

https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Home.aspx

Agar aap ka Islamic account hai Bank Alfalah mein toh neeche diye gae link mein click kijiye

https://rapid.bankalfalah.com/AlfalahRapidPROD/Index.aspx

Mazeed agar aapne mobile se ‘Debit’ likh kar 8287 per message karte hain toh aap ko department 48 working hours mein raabta karega aur aap kay fresh debit card ki request initiate karega.

Aap hamare WhatsApp Banking per BOT kay zariye bhi apply kar sakte hain. Apply karne ka tareekar neeche mentioned hai.

·         Access Kijiye Bank Alfalah’s WhatsApp BOT ka.

·         Select kijiye option 1 ‘Banking services’.

·         Select kijiye option 1 ‘Cards’.

·         Select kijiye option 1 ‘Debit Cards’.

·         Select kijiye option 3 ‘Apply Debit Card’.

·         Confirm kijiye ‘Yes’ ya ‘No’ kay sath.

Aap ko department ki janib se 48 working hours mein call aaegi jis mein application ko forward kia jaega.

Wallet Account opening / Wallet open / ALFA Account Opening On Mobile

English

Dear customer, please below have the steps for Wallet Account open;

·         Go The Play Store & Download the ALFA App

·         After Download the App (Main Screen)

·         Push the Main Menu & Select the “Open Alfa Account”

·         Use The Promo Code “SC”

·         Fill ID Card Number, ID Card Issue Date & Mobile Number Then Select Three Lines

·         Push the Agree

·         OTP msg enter then enter the pin code (9647), Pass Word(Pak2stan)

·         Enter Mother Name (Without Bibi, just Name, Father Name, Birth Place & City

·         Fetch the ID Card Front Side Pic & Back Side Pic and then Proceed

·         Your Alfa Account has been opened.

·         Go Back to Main Screen & Push the Overview Icon

·         Select the Limit

·         Select any limit and submit

·         Now your account is ready.

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, Wallet Account khulwane ke liye neeche diye gaye steps follow karein:

·         Play Store mein jayein aur ALFA App ko download karein.

·         App download hone ke baad (Main Screen)

·         Main Menu ko press karein aur "Open Alfa Account" select karein.

·         Promo Code "SC" ka istemal karein.

·         ID Card Number, ID Card Issue Date aur Mobile Number bharein, phir Three Lines ko select karein.

·         Agree par click karein.

·         OTP message enter karein, phir pin code (9647), Password (Pak2stan) enter karein.

·         Mother Name (Bibi ke bina, sirf Name), Father Name, Birth Place aur City enter karein.

·         ID Card ke front side aur back side ki tasweerain lekar proceed karein.

·         Aap ka Alfa Account khula hai.

·         Main Screen par wapas jayein aur Overview Icon ko press karein.

·         Limit ko select karein.

·         Koi bhi limit choose karein aur submit karein.

·         Ab aap ka account tayyar hai.

 

RAPID Account Opening / Account open steps through RAPID

Dear customer, please below have the steps of RAPID Account opening;

·         Please visit https://www.bankalfalah.com from any browser

·         Click on Alfalah Rapid.

·         Click “Open your Account now” to open your RAPID Account with Bank Alfalah.

·         Select your Account type -Current Account according to your transactional needs.

·         Select Preferred Product by reading more about each of our product categories.

·         Read the Document Checklist to ensure you have all documents prepared with you.

·         Select Close to start your RAPID Account Opening Process

·         Account type -Savings Account

·         Document Checklist

 

Stage 0: Verification Details

·         On this screen, please enter your Identity type, ID Number, Issue Date, Email address, Mobile network and Mobile Number for verification purposes.

·         In addition, please upload a picture of your CNIC front and back.

·         Once done, press Save and Next to proceed to Stage 1 of the RAPID Account Opening Form.

Stage 1: Personal Details

·         On this screen, please enter Personal Details including Name, Father’s/Husband’s Name, Mother’s Maiden Name, Gender, DOB, Place of Birth, Country of Residence, and ID card expiry date.

·         On this screen, please enter Next of Kin’s details and your contact details (current and permanent addresses).

·         Next, if you hold dual nationality please fill details accordingly and provide CRS details.

Stage 2: Occupational Details (For Business)

·         On this screen, you are required to enter Occupational Details including Profession, Source of Funds, Funds Provider and Expected Monthly Salary.

·         For Know your Customer(KYC) purposes, please enter Purpose of account, Modes of Deposit/withdrawal as well as the amount expected to be credited.

·         Press Save and Next to proceed to Stage 3 of the RAPID Account Opening Form

Stage 2: Occupational Details (For Salaried Individuals)

·         On this screen, you are required to enter Occupational Details including Name of Employer, Profession, Source of Funds, Expected Monthly Salary and Office Address.

·         For Know your Customer(KYC) purposes, please enter Purpose of account, Modes of Deposit/withdrawal as well as the amount expected to be credited.

·         Press Save and Next to proceed to Stage 3 of the RAPID Account Opening Form.

Stage 2: Occupational Details (For others)

·         On this screen, you are required to enter Occupational Details including Profession, Source of Funds, Funds Provider and Expected Monthly Salary.

·         For Know your Customer(KYC) purposes, please enter Purpose of account, Modes of Deposit/withdrawal as well as the amount expected to be credited.

·         Press Save and Next to proceed to Stage 3 of the RAPID Account Opening Form.

Stage 3: Banking Requirements

·         On this screen, you are required to enter Account Details including Account Type and Category, Product Type, and Title. In addition, please specify the services you require, e.g. Debit Card type, cheque book, e-statement and SMS Alert facilities.

·         Press Save and Next to proceed to Stage 4 of the RAPID Account Opening Form.

Stage 4: Documents Upload

·         On this screen, you are required to upload photos of original documents including Scanned copy of your Signature, Proof of Address, Proof of Income and other tax details.

·         Once uploaded, press Save and Next to proceed to Stage 5 of the RAPID Account Opening Form.

Stage 5: T&C’s and Declaration

·         This is the final step of Account Application Process.

·         On this screen, you must agree to the Terms & Conditions of Account Opening at Bank Alfalah.

·         Press Save and Submit to submit your RAPID Account Opening Form.

Acknowledgement

·         Once the form is submitted, customer receives an acknowledgment on screen and through an email.

·         After submission, Bank Alfalah shall review the Account Opening request and activate the account within 24 Hours (1 Working Day) in case of no discrepancy.

·         In case of a discrepancy, one of the representatives of the bank shall revert to the customer for resolution within timeline.

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, RAPID Account khulwane ke liye neeche diye gaye steps follow karein:

·         Kisi bhi browser se https://www.bankalfalah.com par visit karein.

·         Alfalah Rapid par click karein.

·         "Open your Account now" par click karein apna RAPID Account Bank Alfalah ke saath kholne ke liye.

·         Apne transactional needs ke mutabiq - Current Account ko select karein.

·         Har product category ke baare mein zyada jaan ne ke liye Preferred Product ko select karein.

·         Document Checklist ko parhein taake aapke paas tamaam documents tayyar hon.

·         RAPID Account Opening Process shuru karne ke liye "Close" ko select karein.

·         Account type - Savings Account

·         Document Checklist

 

Stage 0: Tafseelat Ki Tasdeeq

·         Is screen par, tafseelat ki tasdeeq ke liye apne Identity type, ID Number, Issue Date, Email address, Mobile network, aur Mobile Number enter karein.

·         Mazeed iske, apni CNIC ki front aur back ki tasweerain upload karein.

·         Jab ye sab kuch hojaaye, "Save and Next" dabain taake RAPID Account Opening Form ke Stage 1 mein aage barh sakein.

Stage 1: Personal Tafseelat

·         Is screen par, apne personal tafseelat dakhil karein, jise ke naam, walid/haqeeqi walida ka naam, walida ka asal naam, jins, paidaish ki taarikh, paidaish ka maqam, rehnay wala mulk, aur ID card ki expiry date shaamil hain.

·         Is screen par, Next of Kin ki tafseelat aur aapki taarufi tafseelat (mojood aur mustaqil addresses) dakhil karein.

·         Agar aap doosri qoumiyat rakhte hain toh, uske mutabiq tafseelat bharain aur CRS tafseelat munfarid karein.

Stage 2: Occupational Details (Karobar ke liye)

·         Is screen par, aapko apni occupational tafseelat dakhil karne hongi, jise ke pesha, fundon ka asal zariya, funds provider, aur maqami maasik aamdani shaamil hai.

·         Apne customer ko pehchane ke (KYC) maqsad ke liye, account ka maqsad, jama/withdrawal ke tareeqay, aur jumma hone wale raqam dakhil karein.

·         Stage 3 of the RAPID Account Opening Form ke liye aage barhne ke liye "Save and Next" dabain.

Stage 2: Occupational Details (Salaried Afrad ke liye)

·         Is screen par, aapko apni pesha'i tafseelat dakhil karne hongi, jise ke employer ka naam, pesha, fundon ka asal zariya, maasik aamdani aur daftar ka pata shaamil hai.

·         Apne customer ko pehchane ke (KYC) maqsad ke liye, account ka maqsad, jama/withdrawal ke tareeqay, aur jumma hone wale raqam dakhil karein.

·         Stage 3 of the RAPID Account Opening Form ke liye aage barhne ke liye "Save and Next" dabain.

Stage 2: Occupational Details (others ke liye)

·         Is screen par, aapko apni pesha'i tafseelat dakhil karne hongi, jise ke pesha, fundon ka asal zariya, funds provider, aur maasik aamdani shaamil hai.

·         Apne customer ko pehchane ke (KYC) maqsad ke liye, account ka maqsad, jama/withdrawal ke tareeqay, aur jumma hone wale raqam dakhil karein.

·         Stage 3 of the RAPID Account Opening Form ke liye aage barhne ke liye "Save and Next" dabain.

Stage 3: Banki Zarurat

·         Is screen par, aapko account ki tafseelat dakhil karni hogi, jise ke account ka qisam aur shuba, product ka qisam, aur title. Mazeed, tafseelat den jese aap ko kon konse khidmaten chahiye, jese Debit Card ka qisam, cheque book, e-statement aur SMS Alert ka imkanat.

·         Stage 4 of the RAPID Account Opening Form ke liye aage barhne ke liye "Save and Next" dabain.

Stage 4: Dastavez Upload

·         Is screen par, aapko asal dastavez ki tasweerain upload karni hongi, jese ke aapki mukhtalif documents ka scan copy, jese ke aapki signature ki tasweer, pata ki tasdeeq ka saboot, aamdani ka saboot aur doosri tax ki tafseelat.

·         Jab upload hojaye, "Save and Next" dabain taake Stage 5 of the RAPID Account Opening Form mein aage barh sakein.

Stage 5: Shara'it aur Bayan

·         Ye hissa Hesiyat Khata Khulwane ke Aakhir Mukaam ka hai.

·         Is screen par, aapko Bank Alfalah ke Hesiyat Khata Khulwane ki Shara'it aur Bayan se ittefaq karna hoga.

·         Apna RAPID Account Opening Form jama karne ke liye "Save and Submit" dabain.

Tasdeeq

·         Jab form jama kardiya jata hai, toh customer ko screen par aur email ke zariye tasdeeq miljati hai.

·         Jama hone ke baad, Bank Alfalah Hesiyat Khata Khulwane ki darkhwast ko jaanchega aur agar koi ghalati na ho toh account ko 24 ghanton ke andar (1 Working Day) faa'al kardega.

·         Agar koi ghalati payi jati hai, toh bank ke kisi numainde ne customer ko masla hal karne ke liye muddat ke andar jawab dena hoga.

Asaan Digital Account Opening using Alfa app / Asaan Digital Account (ADA) / Asaan Digital Remittance Account (ADRA) / Freelancer Digital Account (FDA)

 

Dear customer, please below have the step of Asaan Digital Account opening from Alfa app;

 

1.       After opening the Alfa App there are two options on the landing screen which will redirect the customer to Digital Account Opening Banner, Click on: 1. Login Now 2. In App Products Banner for DAO

2.       You will be redirected to Login screen where the Banner for Digital Account Opening will be present on top. Click on ‘Open Now’ to proceed.

3.       An information screen will appear informing the customers that this account is meant for Resident Pakistanis. Click ‘Next’ to proceed.

4.       An information screen will appear showing the two options for Conventional & Islamic which the customer can avail. Click ‘Next’ to proceed.

5.       A ‘What you need’ screen will appear informing the customers regarding basic criteria for an Asaan & a Regular account. Click ‘Get Started Now’ to proceed.

6.       A preliminary information screen will appear where the customer has to put in his CNIC details & Mobile Number which is registered against CNIC. Email is Optional. Click ‘Proceed’.

7.       Biometric Verification screen will appear where the customer can Click on hand gesture options for Biometric.

8.       Biometric Verification Guide will appear where the customer can see steps for a successful Biometric verification.

9.       Show your fingerprints in the camera and hold it stable until the red scan is completed.

10.   Biometric Success screen will appear when the biometric is done right. While in case of unsuccessful biometric you will have two options: 1) Retry 2) or Continue without biometric.

11.   Category Selection screen will appear where customer can choose between an Asaan Digital Account or a Regular Digital Account.

12.   Upon clicking the Asaan Digital Account an option for Conventional & Islamic will Appear for the customer to choose. After selecting their preference, they will get another option for opening a Current or Savings account.

13.   After selecting either Savings or Current Account, the customer will be redirected to Personal details screen. Name & Gender will be auto populated from CNIC but customer still has to review it. Furthermore, customer has to fill in all details specially ‘Occupation Type’ as that would determine the type of Asaan Digital Accounts he/she can opt for in the Banking Details screen. For example: Salaried, Business Individual and Individuals will see the option of Asaan Digital Account & Asaan Digital Remittance Account. Freelancer will see the options of Freelancer Digital Account (PKR/ USD) In case of biometric failure previously, the customer will see two additional fields here: 1) Mother's maiden name 2) Place of birth.

14.   If the customer opts for a Debit Card only then will he/she will be asked for details such as Preferred card type, Name on Card, and mailing address.

15.   If the customer opts for a Cheque book only/ and a Debit Card, then he/she will be asked for details such as Mailing Address and Preferred branch only.

16.   After Banking details are completed, customer will be routed to FATCA information –This section only applies to US persons. If they are not a US person, they may select ‘No’ for all questions.

17.   If a customer clicks Yes for the first OR/and Yes for the Second question, a W9 form is generated. They will also be asked their SS no.

18.   If a customer clicks ‘No’ for the first two questions and ‘Yes’ for either/all of the 3 rd,4th and 5th questions, a W8 BEN form is generated.

19.   CRS information will be auto populated for Pakistani citizens, however customer may still review.

20.   After completing FATCA information customers will be routed to Self Declaration for Income section for proof of income. & lastly their Live Photo shall be taken.

21.   Self Declaration for Income pop up will appear where the customer for the customer to Agree/ Disagree to proceed.

22.   After completing the Declaration and checking the acknowledgement box, customer will be routed to T&C.

23.   Terms & Conditions form will appear in detail. Click on ‘Close’ to proceed.

24.   Before submission all your details may be reviewed once more.

25.   The above will appear after successful account opening.

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, Alfa app se Asaan Digital Account khulwane ke kadam neeche diye gaye hain;

 

1.       Alfa App kholne ke baad landing screen par do options hote hain jo customer ko Digital Account Opening Banner par redirect karenge, Click on: 1. Abhi Login Karein 2. In App Products Banner for DAO

2.       Aap ko Login screen par redirect kiya jayega jahan Digital Account Opening ka Banner sab se oopar hoga. 'Open Now' par click karein aage barhne ke liye.

3.       Aik information screen aayegi jis mein customers ko bataya jayega ke yeh account Pakistan ke rehaishi logon ke liye hai. Aage barhne ke liye 'Next' par click karein.

4.       Aik information screen aayegi jis mein do options Conventional & Islamic dikhai denge jinhe customer faida utha sakta hai. 'Next' par click karein aage barhne ke liye.

5.       'Jo Aap Ko Chahiye' screen aayegi jis mein customers ko Asaan aur Regular account ke mool crieteria ke baare mein bataya jayega. Aage barhne ke liye ' Get Started Now ' par click karein.

6.       Aik ibtidaai maloomat ki screen aayegi jahan customer ko apna CNIC aur Mobile Number jo CNIC ke saath register hai daalna hoga. Email optional hai. 'Next' par click karein.

7.       Biometric Tasdeeq ki screen aayegi jahan customer ko Biometric ke liye haath ke isharon par click karna hoga.

8.       Biometric Tasdeeq Guide aayega jahan customer ko safalta se Biometric tasdeeq ke steps dikhaye jayenge.

9.       Apne ungliyon ko camera mein dikhayen aur ise stable rakhen jab tak surkhi scan mukammal na hojaye.

10.   Biometric Safalta ki screen aayegi jab biometric sahi se hojaye. Jab biometric nakam ho to aapko do options milenge: 1) Dobara Koshish Karen 2) Ya Biometric ke baghair jari rakhen.

11.   Category Selection screen aayegi jahan customer ko Asaan Digital Account ya Regular Digital Account mein se chunne ka mouqa milega.

12.   Asaan Digital Account par click karne ke baad customer ko Conventional & Islamic ka option dikhai dega jise woh chun sakte hain. Apni pasand chunne ke baad, unhein ek aur option milega Current ya Savings account kholne ka.

13.   Savings ya Current Account chunne ke baad, customer ko Personal details screen par redirect kiya jayega. Name aur Gender CNIC se auto populated hoga lekin customer ko ise zaroor review karna hoga. Mazeed, customer ko sabhi tafseelat bharni hogi khaas kar 'Pesha'i Qisam' kyunki yeh Banking Details screen mein Asaan Digital Accounts ka qisam tay karega. For example: Salaried, Business Individual aur Individuals Asaan Digital Account & Asaan Digital Remittance Account ka option dekh sakte hain. Freelancer Freelancer Digital Account (PKR/ USD) ka option dekhega. Agar pehle biometric mein kami thi to customer yahan do mazeed fields dekhega: 1) Walida ka asal naam 2) Paidaish ka maqam.

14.   Agar customer sirf Debit Card chunne ke liye hai to usse apni pasandeeda card type, card par naam, aur mailing address ke tafseelat di jayegi.

15.   Agar customer sirf Cheque book aur Debit Card chunne ke liye hai, to usse apni mailing address aur pasandeeda branch ke tafseelat di jayegi.

16.   Jab Banki tafseelat mukammal hojaye, customer ko FATCA maloomat par redirect kiya jayega – ye section sirf US ke logon ke liye hai. Agar woh US ke log nahi hain, toh woh tamam sawalon ke liye 'No' chun sakte hain.

17.   Agar customer pehle ya doosre sawal ka jawab 'Haan' chunte hain, toh ek W9 form banaya jayega. Unse unka SS number bhi poocha jayega.

18.   Agar customer pehle do sawalon mein 'Nahi' chunte hain aur teesre, chouthay aur paanchwe sawal mein se kisi ek ya zyada ke liye 'Haan' chunte hain, toh ek W8 BEN form banaya jayega.

19.   CRS maloomat Pakistani citizens ke liye automatically populate hogi, lekin customer ise zaroor review kar sakte hain.

20.   FATCA maloomat mukammal karne ke baad, customers ko apni aamdani ke proof ke liye Self Declaration section mein liya jayega. Aur aakhri mein unki live tasveer li jayegi.

21.   Self Declaration for Income pop up aayega jahan customer ko Agee/Inkaar karne ka mauqa diya jayega.

22.   Declaration mukammal hone ke baad aur acknowledgment box ko check karne ke baad, customer ko T&C par redirect kiya jayega.

23.   T&C form tafseel se dikhai dega. Aage barhne ke liye 'Close' par click karein.

24.   Jama karne se pehle apni tamaam tafseelat ek baar mazeed review karein.

25.   Upar diye gaye sab kuch safalta purvak account khulne ke baad dikhai dega.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Alfa app

 

Registration procedure:

Registration Through Account

 

English

Dear customer, please follow the below steps if you have an account in Bank Alfalah and want to registered with Bank Alfalah Account.

·         Download the Alfa app from the Play store or App store through the link https://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/self-service-banking/alfa/

·         User will click on Login

·         User will click on Register Now

·         User will click on Already Bank Alfalah account holder

·         User will i. Click on Account holder ii. Enter 14 digits’ account number, CNIC, DOB and carrier and Mobile Number iii. Click on Next

·         User will: i. Select secret question. ii. Enter email ID and user ID iii. Click on Next

·         User will call our helpline to activate the facility.

·         Visit the Bank Alfalah ATM/CCDM machine or branch for biometric verification. Alternatively, you can perform biometric verification through the Alfa app, but it has a daily limit of Rs. 15000.

·         After successful biometric verification, an OTAC (One-Time Activation Code) will be generated. The first 5 digits/characters will be sent to your registered email, and the last 5 digits/characters will be sent via SMS to your registered mobile number.

Urdu

Dear customer, agar aap Bank Alfalah mein account rakhte hain aur Bank Alfalah Account se registered hona chahte hain, to neechay diye gaye steps follow karein:

Alfa app ko Play Store ya App Store se download karein is link se: https://www.bankalfalah.com/personal-banking/self-service-banking/alfa/

User 'Login' par click karega.

User 'Register Now' par click karega.

User 'Already Bank Alfalah account holder' par click karega.

User: i. 'Account holder' par click karega. ii. 14 digits ke account number, CNIC, DOB, carrier aur Mobile Number daalega. iii. 'Next' par click karega. User: i. Secret question select karega. ii. Email ID aur user ID daalega. iii. 'Next' par click karega.

User hamari helpline par call karega facility ko activate karne ke liye.

Bank Alfalah ATM/CCDM machine ya branch jaake biometric verification karayega. Agar aap Alfa app se biometric verification karna chahte hain, toh woh Rs. 15,000 tak ka daily limit rakhti hai. Safal biometric verification ke baad, OTAC (One-Time Activation Code) generate hoga. Pehle 5 digits/characters aapke registered email par bheje jayenge, aur aakhri 5 digits/characters aapke registered mobile number par SMS ke zariye bheje jayenge.

Alfa Login /forgot credentials on an un-binded device

 

English

This is to inform you that now customers can login Alfa/use forgot credentials on an un-binded device through below revised mechanism.

Steps for Android Users through OTP or Biometric verification

·         In order to use a new device, customer will be required to login by entering username & password

·         Upon entering Username & Password, Customer will be directed to OTP authentication screen, where Alfa App will auto fetch OTP (there will be no manual option to enter the OTP). For this customer shall ensure that the SIM card of the registered mobile number is inserted in the same device. Else OTP will not be fetched.

·         Incase 1st OTP attempt is failed then resend button for OTP will be enabled in 30 seconds. Customer can resend OTP 2 more times, so in total 3 attempts of OTP will be allowed.

·         If all 3 OTP attempts are exhausted, then customer will be diverted to biometric verification.

·         If biometric verification fails in 4 attempts, then customer will fall in cool off period (It will be comprising of 24 hours, which means customer can reattempt the above process again after 24 hours)

·         If customer does not want to wait for 24 hours to reattempt, he/she needs to visit any nearest branch for new device activation.

·         If all 10 consecutive attempts of cool off period are failed then on 11th attempt, Alfa username will be blocked/de-activated and customer needs to contact helpline and Officer will activate his/her Alfa.

Note: On successful OTP or Biometric verification customer needs to setup login PIN to use Alfa on new device.

URDU

Yeh aapko batane ke liye hai ke ab customers Alfa mein login ya 'forgot credentials' unbound device par neeche diye gaye revised mechanism ke through kar sakte hain.

Android Users ke liye Steps OTP ya Biometric Verification ke zariye:

• Naye device mein istemal karne ke liye, customer ko username aur password enter karke login karna hoga. • Username aur Password enter karne ke baad, Customer ko OTP authentication screen par redirect kiya jayega, jahan Alfa App apne aap OTP ko fetch karega (manual OTP enter karne ka option nahi hoga). Iske liye customer ko yaad rakhna hoga ke registered mobile number ka SIM card wahi device mein insert hona chahiye. Agar nahi hai, to OTP fetch nahi hoga.

• Agar pehli OTP attempt fail hoti hai, to 30 seconds ke baad OTP ko dobara bhejne ka button enabled hoga. Customer total 3 attempts mein OTP dobara bhej sakta hai.

• Agar teeno OTP attempts fail hojati hain, to customer ko biometric verification par bheja jayega.

• Agar 4 attempts mein biometric verification fail hojati hai, to customer ko cool off period mein bheja jayega (yeh 24 ghante ka hota hai, matlab customer 24 ghante ke baad phir se yeh process kar sakta hai).

• Agar customer 24 ghante tak wait nahi karna chahta, toh woh kisi bhi nazdeeki branch mein jaake naye device ko activate karwa sakta hai.

• Agar 10 consecutive attempts ke cool off period fail hojate hain, toh 11th attempt par Alfa username block/deactivate hojayega aur customer ko helpline se contact karna hoga, jahan Officer unka Alfa activate karega.

Note: Successful OTP ya Biometric verification ke baad, customer ko login PIN setup karna hoga Alfa mein istemal ke liye.

English

Steps for IOS/iPhone Users through OTP & Biometric verification

·         In order to use a new device, customer will be required to login by entering username & password

·         Upon entering Username & Password, Customer will be directed to OTP authentication screen, where customer need to enter OTP manually).

·         After successful OTP authentication, customer will be required to perform biometric verification.

·         Incase 1st OTP attempt is failed then resend button for OTP will be enabled in 30 seconds. Customer can resend OTP 2 more times, so in total 3 attempts of OTP will be allowed.

·         In case OTP attempts are exhausted then customer will fall in cool off period (It will be comprising of 24 hours, which means customer can reattempt the above process again after 24 hours)

·         If OTP is successful, customer will be required to perform biometric verification and If biometric verification fails in 4 attempts, then customer will fall in cool off period (It will be comprising of 24 hours, which means customer can reattempt the above process again after 24 hours)

·         If customer does not want to wait for 24 hours to reattempt, he/she needs to visit any nearest branch for new device activation.

·         If all 10 consecutive attempts of cool off period are failed then on 11th attempt, Alfa username will be blocked/de-activated and customer needs to contact helpline and Officer will activate his/her Alfa.

Note: On successful OTP or Biometric verification customer needs to setup login PIN to use Alfa on new device.

 

URDU

iOS/iPhone istemal karne wale users ke liye OTP aur Biometric verification ke zariye steps:

·         New device istemal karne ke liye, customer ko username aur password enter karke login karna hoga.

·         Username aur Password enter karne ke baad, Customer ko OTP authentication screen par redirect kiya jayega, jahan customer ko OTP manually enter karna hoga.

·         Safal OTP authentication ke baad, customer ko biometric verification karna hoga.

·         Agar pehli OTP attempt fail hojati hai, to 30 seconds ke baad OTP ko dobara bhejne ka button enabled hoga. Customer total 3 attempts mein OTP dobara bhej sakta hai.

·         Agar OTP attempts khatam hojate hain, to customer ko 24 ghante ke liye cool off period mein bhej diya jayega (yani customer 24 ghante ke baad phir se yeh process kar sakta hai).

·         Agar OTP safal hoti hai, to customer ko biometric verification karna hoga aur agar 4 attempts mein biometric verification fail hojati hai, to customer ko 24 ghante ke liye cool off period mein bhej diya jayega (yani customer 24 ghante ke baad phir se yeh process kar sakta hai).

·         Agar customer 24 ghante tak wait nahi karna chahta, toh woh kisi bhi nazdeeki branch mein jaake naye device ko activate karwa sakta hai.

·         Agar 10 musalsal koshishon ke baad bhi cool off period mein nakam hojaye, to 11th koshish par, Alfa username block/de-activate hojayega aur customer ko helpline se rabta karna hoga. Officer unka Alfa activate karega.

Note: Successful OTP ya Biometric verification ke baad, customer ko login PIN setup karna hoga Alfa mein istemal ke liye.

 

After Login Screen:

 

 

Send Money

Bank Alfalah Account holders

English

Dear customer, to transfer funds into your Bank Alfalah account, please follow the steps given below:

·         Log in to the Alfa app.

·         Tap on "Send Money."

·         Tap on "Bank Alfalah."

·         If you are selecting from registered payees, kindly select the payee, and if the payee is not there, kindly tap on the "+" symbol.

·         Select your Account number from the dropdown which you wish to use for transferring funds.

·         Enter the Bank Alfalah account number where you wish to send the money.

·         Enter the amount.

·         The account title will be fetched; kindly tap on “Send Now.”

·         Proceed by entering the One-Time Authorization Code (OTAC), which you will receive on your email and mobile number. OTAC will Expire: 3 wrong attempts / After 5 minutes

·         If you want to create a payee on this screen, then kindly enable the Payee option.

·         Name your payee.

·         A transaction receipt will be displayed on your screen, which you can choose to save or share if you want.

Urdu

Moazziz sarif, Bank Alfalah account mein funds transfer karne kay liye aap neeche diye gae steps ko follow karenge:

·         Login kijiye Alfa app.

·         Tap kijiye “Send Money” per.

·         Tap kijiye “Bank Alfalah”

·         Agar payees mein se karna hai toh kindly payee select kijiye aur agar payee nahi hai toh kindly tap kijiye “+” per.

·         Apna Account number select kijiye drop down se jis account se funds transfer karne hain.

·         Jis account mein paise bhejne hain kindly woh Bank Alfalah ka account number enter kijiye.

·         Amount enter kijiye.

·         Aap ko account ka title fetch hoga kindly “Send Now” per tap kijiye.

·         Proceed kijiye OTAC enter kar kay jo kay aap ko email per aur mobile number per receive hoga. OTAC khatam hojayega: 3 galat koshishon ke baad / 5 minute ke baad.

·         Agar payee banana chahte hain aap iss screen per toh Kindly Payee ko enable kijiye.

·         Naam dijiye payee ka.

·         Aap ki screen per transaction receipt show hogi jisse aap chahen toh save bhi kar sakte hain aur share bhi kar sakte hain.

Other Bank Account holders

 

English

Dear customer, to transfer funds to other bank account from Alfa app, please follow the steps given below:

·         Log into the Alfa app.

·         Tap on “Send Money.”

·         Tap on “Other Banks.”

·         Select the bank of the account you want to transfer funds from.

·         Choose your Account number from the dropdown that you wish to transfer funds from.

·         Enter the account number / IBAN of the Bank Alfalah account where you want to send the funds.

·         Enter the amount you wish to transfer.

·         Select the purpose of payment from the dropdown.

·         The account title will be fetched, please tap on “Send Now.”

·         Proceed by entering the One Time Authentication Code (OTAC), which you will receive on your email and mobile number.

·         If you want to create a payee on this screen, then kindly enable the Payee option.

·         Name your payee.

·         A transaction receipt will be displayed on your screen which you can choose to save or share, if you wish.

Mobile top up

Post-paid / Pre Paid

English

Dear customer, if you wish to top up your Mobile postpaid SIM, please follow the steps given below:

·         Log in to the Alfa app.

·         Tap on "Mobile Top up."

·         Tap again on “Mobile Top up.”

·         Select or enter the Mobile number.

·         Choose the Mobile number's company (Jazz/SCOM/Telenor/Ufone/Zong).

·         Enter the amount and tap next.

·         Choose the account (Account/Credit Card/Orbit/Wallet) from which you want to debit the amount. (If you want to combine account+credit card+Orbit, then tap on Add payment option; a combination of a maximum of 3 products is allowed.)

·         Proceed by entering the OTAC (One Time Authentication Code) that you will receive on your email and mobile number.

·         If you want to create a payee on this screen, then kindly enable the Payee option.

·         Name your payee.

·         A transaction receipt will be displayed on your screen which you can choose to save or share, if you wish.

NOTE: When topping up the mobile, orbits cannot be used if they are less than 500.

Overview (My Accounts / My Cards / My Orbits)

My Account

English

Dear customer, you can check the details of your Account/Credit card/Orbit/Wallet in the overview section from Alfa app:

My Account/Account Details:

Dear customer, you can view your account balance, account number, your account's IBAN, the name of your branch, details about Zakat exemption for your account, Account details, and account statement in Alfa app.

Account Statement:

You can view your account statement for the past 90 days, and if you wish to receive your account statement on your email address, you can do so through the Alfa app.

NOTE: You cannot obtain an account statement older than 3 years from the Alfa app. If you wish to get a statement older than 3 years, please visit your parent branch regarding this matter.

To download the Account Statement, please follow the steps given below:

·         Log into the Alfa app.

·         Tap on the Drop Down.

·         Tap on Overview.

·         Tap on View Statement.

·         Tap on the download Icon which will be at the top right of your screen.

·         Tap on Select Date.

·         Select the Date Range (should not be more than 3 years).

·         Tap on Send Now.

·         A pop-up will appear for confirmation.

·         You will receive the account statement at your registered email address within 5 to 10 minutes.

·         Select the Date Range (can't be more than 1 year).

·         Tap on the download Icon which is located at the top right of your screen.

·         You will receive the orbit statement at your registered email address within 5 to 10 minutes.

URDU

Dear customer, my orbits ki screen per aap apne Bank Alfalah kay reward points (orbits) ki details view kar sakte hain. Jis mein aap check kar sakte hain aap kay available orbit, aap kay kitne orbit earned kijiye iss month mein, aap ne kitne orbit redeemed kiye hain is month mein, orbits ki transaction history ko view kar sakte hain aur kitne orbits expired howe hain aap who view kar sakte hain.

English

·         Log in to the Alfa app.

·         Select the Purpose of Payment.

·         If you want to create a payee on this screen, then kindly enable the Payee option.

·         Name your payee.

·         Proceed by entering the OTAC, which you will receive on your email and mobile number.

·         A transaction receipt will appear on your screen, which you can choose to save or share.

NOTE: With RAAST, there are no IBFT charges applied, and the transaction will be successfully completed.

·         Select the Account that you wish to debit the amount from.

·         Proceed by entering the OTAC received on your email and phone number.

·         If you want to create a payee on this screen, then kindly enable the Payee option.

·         A transaction receipt will be shown on your screen which you can save and share if you desire.

QR Payments

 

English

Dear customer, if you want to make a QR payment through the Alfa app, please follow the steps given below:

·         Log in to the Alfa app.

·         Tap on the Drop Down.

·         Tap on Payments.

·         Tap on QR Payment.

·         Scan the QR Code or if you have a QR image in your mobile gallery then tap on the top right gallery icon on the top right and scan the QR after cropping it.

·         After the QR is scanned, the details will be auto-fetched; kindly review them.

·         Select (Account/Credit card/Orbit/Wallet) from which you want to debit the amount.

·         Proceed by entering the OTAC that you will receive via email and on your mobile number.

·         A transaction receipt will be displayed on your screen, which you can save or share if you wish.

 

You can also make a QR payment from the home screen by following the steps given below:

·         Log in to the Alfa app.

·         Tap on the Scanner (Round Icon) in the center of the Home screen.

·         Scan the QR Code or if you have a QR image in your mobile gallery then tap on the top right gallery icon on the top right and scan the QR after cropping it.

·         After the QR is scanned, the details will be auto-fetched; kindly review them.

·         Select (Account/Credit card/Orbit/Wallet) from which you want to debit the amount.

·         Proceed by entering the OTAC that you will receive via email and on your mobile number.

·         A transaction receipt will be displayed on your screen, which you can save or share if you wish.

URDU

Dear customer, agar aap QR paymment karna chahte hain Alfa app se toh kindly neeche diye gae steps ko follow kijiye:

·         Login kijiye Alfa app.

·         Tap kijiye Drop Down per.

·         Tap kijiye Payments per.

·         Tap kijiye QR Payment per.

·         QR Code Scan Kijye ya phir aap ki Mobile gallery mein agar QR image hai toh aap upper right top gallery icon per tap kijiye aur QR ko scan kijiye Crop kar kay.

·         QR scan hone kay baad details auto fetch hongi kindly review kijiye.

·         Select kijiye (Account/Credit card/Orbit/Wallet) jis account se aap amount debit karna chahte hain.

·         Proceed kijiye OTAC enter kar kay jo kay aap ko email per aur mobile number per receive hoga.

·         Aap ki screen per transaction receipt show hogi jisse aap chahen toh save bhi kar sakte hain aur share bhi kar sakte hain.

Aap QR payment Home screen per rehte howe bhi kar sakte hain. Neeche diye gae steps ko follow kijiye:

·         Login kijiye Alfa app.

·         Home screen per center mein jo Scanner (Round Icon) hai us per tap kijiye.

·         QR Code Scan Kijye ya phir aap ki Mobile gallery mein agar QR image hai toh aap upper right top gallery icon per tap kijiye aur QR ko scan kijiye Crop kar kay.

RAAST RAAST User Journey – Alfa / RAAST ID CREATION

 

RAAST Registration

English

To be able to receive funds on Raast ID, User must first register themselves through Raast ID Management tab available in Side Menu

·         User will click on Raast ID from side menu

·         Registered Mobile Number will be displayed as My Raast ID

·         User can select account for linking to Raast ID

·         Confirmation prompt will appear, User will click on yes

·         User will enter OTAC

Urdu

Funds Raast ID par hasil karne ke liye, istemal karne wala pehle khud ko Raast ID Management tab mein register karna hoga, jo ke Side Menu mein dastiyab hai.

·         User Raast ID par click karega Side Menu se.

·         Register kiya gaya Mobile Number "My Raast ID" ke tor par dikhai dega.

·         User Raast ID se link karne ke liye account select kar sakta hai.

·         Tasdeeq ka message aayega, jisme user yes par click karega.

·         User OTAC enter karega.

 

 

Re-link

English

If User has multiple accounts, they can change account linked against ID, using Re-link option in Raast ID Management.

·         User will click on Raast ID from side menu

·         User can choose a different account to link to ID by checking box and selecting Re-link

·         Confirmation prompt will appear, User will click on yes

·         User will enter OTAC

·         Re-linking complete. Raast ID is re-linked to a different account. User will now receive funds in this account.

Urdu

Agar istemal karne wala ke paas mukhtalif accounts hain, toh woh Raast ID Management mein mojood Re-link option ka istemal karke ID ke khilaf link hua account badal sakta hai.

·         User Raast ID par click karega Side Menu se.

·         User ID ke saath jorna gaya mukhtalif account ko check karke aur Re-link ko select karke dusre account ko choose kar sakta hai.

·         Tasdeeq ka message aayega, jisme user yes par click karega.

·         User OTAC enter karega.

·         Re-linking complete hogi. Raast ID ab ek mukhtalif account se jori jayegi. User ab is account mein funds hasil kar sakega.

De-Link

English

If User wants to remove account linked with ID, then they can use De-link option in Raast ID Management.

·         User will click on Raast ID from side menu

·         User will click on De-link tab

·         User will click on toggle to de-select account

·         Confirmation prompt will appear, User will click on yes

·         User will enter OTAC

Urdu

Agar istemal karne wala apni Raast ID ke saath jora gaya account ko hataana chahta hai, toh woh Raast ID Management mein mojood De-link option ka istemal kar sakta hai.

·         User Raast ID par click karega Side Menu se.

·         User De-link tab par click karega.

·         User toggle par click karke account ko de-select karega.

·         Tasdeeq ka message aayega, jisme user yes par click karega.

·         User OTAC enter karega.

Cards

Cards Management

 

English

Dear Customer, you can activate your E-commerce transactions and Inernational transactions on Bank Alfalah Cards by calling our 24/7 helpline at 021/042 111 225 111, for general Banking / 021 111 225 226 for premier banking and 009221 111 225 226 for Roshan Digital Account. You may also activate your E-commerce and International transactions on Bank Aflalah Cards via Alfa App.

In order to activate this services via Alfa App, please follow the steps below:

·         Log in to the Alfa app.

·         Tap on "Cards".

·         Click on Card management.

·         Click on Manage Transaction.

·         Slide the toggle of channel to activate/Deactivate & click on Save Changes.

·         Enter OTAC and confirm.

·         Successful Prompt of Activation.

·         Successful Prompt of deactivation.

·         Successful Prompt of multiple transactions.

 

URDU

Moazziz sarif, aap Bank Alfalah ke Cards par E-commerce transactions aur International transactions ko activate kar sakte hain hamari 24/7 helpline par call karke, jo keh 021/042 111 225 111 hai, general Banking ke liye / 021 111 225 226 premier banking ke liye aur 009221 111 225 226 Roshan Digital Account ke liye. Aap Bank Alfalah Cards par E-commerce aur International transactions ko Alfa App ke zariye bhi activate kar sakte hain.

Is service ko Alfa App se activate karne ke liye, neechay diye gaye steps follow karein:

·         Alfa app mein login karein.

·         "Cards" par tap karein.

·         Card management par click karein.

·         Manage Transaction par click karein.

·         Channel ka toggle activate/Deactivate karke Save Changes par click karein.

·         OTAC daalein aur confirm karein.

·         Successful Activation ka prompt.

·         Successful Deactivation ka prompt.

·         Multiple transactions ka successful prompt.
